He showed all arguments made for and against Elon.  He documents how some think he his insane, but all recognize his accomplishments are remarkable.  Not only has Musk revolutionalized engineering, he has done it in THREE SEPARATE FIELDS.  He created entire industries from scratch: solar power (Solar city), space exploration (Space X ), and automobile (Tesla).  Bonus: not included is Paypal.The only downside of reading this book is you may feel like a loser after reading this. I feel the sudden urge to do more with my life.  Well done!  Awesome reading. Very thought provoking.

These are pricey but they work amazingly well for removing blackheads and debris that clog up pores. You follow the instructions as stated. Wash your face, wet your nose, apply this strip. In a few minutes, you can peel off your gross debris. It works wonders, especially if you want to keep your face hygienic and beautiful close up. Due to the high price of this item, I generally only use it on special occasions. I have tried other knock off brands of this, but they don't seem to work as well. This product also seems to work better than regular exfoliants do. I would recommend this as part of your special cleaning regimen if you can afford it. I consider this a splurge product. What really is the price of beauty though?

I love the convenience factor of Go Picnic meals. The portions are realy small though so it is more of a snack than a full meal.  I eat these sometimes for breakfast. The flavor I am rating is the "turkey slices and cheddar." It is my second favorite Go Picnic selection. (My first favorite and personal recommendation is the Turkey sticks).  The turkey slices and cheddar have a nice selection of apple sauce with accompanying spoon, crackers with cheese spread and turkey slices and gummies. All of the items in this pack taste decent. The cheese is not bad. It is better than some of the other cheese spreads, but it is a good kit for those wishing for a bite on the go.

A lot of candies. This bag has all the original flavors. It lasts a really long time, too. The whole thing took me > 1 month to finish. I like the online convenience of ordering through Amazon. With Prime Pantry and free shipping this is a good deal.

I just finished a bag of these oreo cookies. They are a nice lemon cream flavor. Not too sugary. Not to sour. I would order these again from Prime Pantry.  The sealing pouch is also good at keeping the fresh taste in. My cookie bag lasted more than 1 week. The taste remained the same.

I do have small feet. I am about a woman's size 6 D.  I love these small bamboo socks. They are light weight and thin. They are extremely breathable and snug. I find them to be comfortable to wear through out a busy work day. I would definitely recommend these to others who enjoy bamboo socks. These are good quality for the price. I would recommend getting them a size larger if you have normal sized feet though.

I got this for my sister. She was obsessed with Shark Tank.  This product did not disappoint. It appears to be heavy duty relative to the other Scrub Daddys. It is a big thicker looking. It also comes lemon scented. She has used this a couple of times to wash the dishes. Even though she used dishwashing detergent, which is supposedly not needed, this product still smells like Lemon. She has used this a couple of times already now.  It still looks brand new. The product retained its shape and works as expected. You pay a little extra for the thicker scrub and the lemon scent, but I think it is worth it if you factor in the cute factor and how sturdy it appears to be.

I like this but it broke easily after my first felting experience. I like how you can arrange how many needles you will use.  You just have to be careful when felting at angles. I ended up snapping off the end of 1 of 3 of my needles. It got stuck in some wool. I couldn't get it out easily. Instead, it just snapped in half.  Besides that, the overall ergonomics of this pen is really nice. It is easy to hold in your hand. It also comes with its own little plastic stand. You can use that to hold your pen.  I really like clover products. So, I am giving this a 4/5 stars.

This actually works really well for felting. I wasn't sure how good it would be.  It's really light weight and looks just like a giant foam sponge. It basically is a giant foam sponge. It is pretty thick and porous. You can poke it with a needle and it will still retain its shape. This makes it a perfect tool for felting. You can stab your wool and mold it to whatever you wish. This is a great tool for serious felters.  I have had this for a while now and my sister and I take turns using it. So far, it has retained its shape.

I am addicted. This is the best of the 3 books.  It makes everything that happened in book 1 & 2 make so much more sense. I would recommend you read the other two before this one, so you get the full impact of how genius Soman is. The story is really well written and action happens quickly. The characters are all ones you can root for or care for. I would argue even the "evil" ones are sympathetic. I actually got the kindle version on pre-order because I was so addicted to the first two.  The formatting was really good.  The moral of the story is also good.  You should check on Good Reads for its rating, where people rank books. This book has one of the highest ratings on that site. I would definitely recommend this to others. It is better than both the first and the second - and those were hard to top.

This is easy to use and a good price. I never had a sprayer before this one. But I found its assembly to be easy and its use to be intuitive. I just followed the drawings carefully. You do need to pump it a couple of times before you will have enough pressure to squirt out. You also want to make sure you have a good seal.  The gallon sprayer is light to carry.  It has a long nozzle. You can select the setting you want for how much spray you will have.

This is my favorite brand of Q tips. The other drug store brands just don't compare. They don't seem to hold up as well. Maybe Q tip has a patent or something on the quality of product because their sticks are firm and do not bend to gentle pressure. I use these for a variety of purposes. The cotton at the end is nice and plush. It is a good quality product and worth the extra price over generic versions. I would buy from Amazon again.

Really soft and convenient. I have tried a bunch of toilet paper deliveries from Amazon, because every time I go to the grocery store I manage to forget the most essential home care necessity. This pack of Cottonelle is soft on the tooshie.  The paper is thick and absorbant. You don't need to use a lot. The pack is pretty decent in price compared to the other ones on sale on Amazon.

I love Advil. It works really well. The tablets are small and not too strong. You can get them in a variety of prescription strengths. I got the 200 mg. I eat one to help me deal with monthly woman's pain. It helps my cramps feel less strong.  I just take one and it lasts for me almost the whole day. Everyone has different metabolic rates. So, you may need to experiment on yourself to see which drug and which dosage works best for you. However, I have found Advil to be a reliable brand. I have bought other brands before, but they do not have as good packaging or have been involved in recall scandals. Advil however to my knowledge has not endured any of these. It is a good product. Even the outer capsule is a pleasant taste.

The price on Amazon is a little more expensive than what you would get in a regular drug store. But, you have the convenience of home delivery. These Vitamin C drops are the best. They taste like real fruit and not too artificial. The citrus variety includes lemon, orange and grapefruit. Each of these are not too sweet. They are great lozenges. I sometimes eat them like they are candy.  Don't worry. Vitamin C is water soluble. Even if you imbibe a lot, it will wash out.Halls makes great cough drops because they taste natural and they are not hollow in the center. The shape is perfectly oval. They are not too big or too small. They last a good while and there are enough variety of flavors in this pack for you to not get bored with the taste. Overall, this is a great product and one of the best on the market.

So, this movie was a lot better than I thought it would be.  It was FREE on Amazon Prime to boot. Most free movies are of mixed quality, especially the newer ones. But this one was pretty decent considering my lowered expectations.  The movie was probably better than Sam Worthington's version of Perseus.In this version of Hercules, there is very little shown about the myth. The version presented here shows Hercules as a man of mythic proportions. The concept tries to make it more realistic. The visuals, costume, make up and music are all very high quality. The action sequences are beautiful and epic. The use of slow motion is done well here.However, the parts that are lacking are that the script and dialogue lack humor and depth. It is pretty standard fare. If you enjoy a B grade popcorn flick, you may like this film.  It has some of the scenery of the Gladiator but the villains are not as scary.  A lot of standard, predictable movie tropes end up being played out.It's a little predictable but half way decent because of the graphics.

Not as interesting or funny as FIB but this has the same style. The story is sweet and short. The protagonist is interesting and a relatable character for young teen girls, who are not popular. This is a Standard teen romance.

This price is not a good value per bag. You only end up with 1 pack of 30. If you have more than one simple human size a trash cans, as I do, this won't last you very long. There is a bulk purchase of 4 packs of 30 on Amazon which is a better deal. The price of this 1 pack should be dropped to $6-7 to be worth its value.

Officially, I am addicted to Moscow Puzzles. I think these brain teasers really tested my old elementary through grade school knowledge. My brother and I had a lot of fun trying to solve these. They brought me back to my childhood. If you like thought exercises and IQ tests, you will enjoy these. They have a variety of difficulty levels. There are an assortment of puzzles to choose from. I think if you like whimsical puzzles, you will enjoy these. They were written for children but have clever math implications. The book is inexpensive for the quality and number of puzzles available. You have over 200+ of puzzles.

I love this little grill. We have used it twice already. It is high quality for a low price. The Weber portable grill was convenient for myself and my family to use. We got a good sear with charcoal. The grates were easy to use. There is a slot at the bottom and one at the top. If you want to start a charcoal fire, you just have to remember to have both slots open. This allows the oxygen to get through!  You need carbon, oxygen and an ignition source to get the fire roasting!  If you close the grate, nothing will happen.  Put some newspapers on the bottom but leave a small hole for the air flow to move through. Pile on your unused charcoal. Light the newspaper and wait for the charcoal to catch.  When the charcoal turns red, orange or grey then you are good to go.  Let it heat the grill for about 30 minutes or so. That way you get an even distribution of heat. Then, you can put on your marinated meat or hotdogs. We used aluminum foil to cover our grill so the hotdogs wouldn't fall in. The dogs still got the grill marks on them and tasted great. I would recommend this cute little guy to anyone looking for a first time Weber grill.

Wow! This was a lot better than I thought it was going to be. I went into this with mediocre expectations and was pleasantly surprised.  I found this film to be entertaining and leave you with a positive feeling. The IMDB rating for it is only 6.6/10, which usually means the movie is bad. But this movie turned out to be pretty decent. It's not the Godfather but it is something fun and light to watch.  There is enough of storyline and witty lines to keep things interesting.  The acting is solid.The plot /concept is pretty basic - similar to "Clueless", "Mean Girls", and "The Heathers" - but in a modern high school and more realistic. Bianca is a regular girl who fits in by virtue of being associated with her beautiful friends.  This doesn't bother her until one day, her old childhood friend Wesley, informs her she is a DUFF. After a chain of events, Bianca sets out on a personal quest to rid herself of this label and become her own person. In the process, she experiments and grows.  There is a bit of a romance story going on. I won't give away spoilers, but the interactions between the characters is funny and charming at times.I would recommend this to people who like shows like "Selfie"  or movies about coming of age.  Everything that happened in this movie is pretty common to high school interactions.  This movie is kind of like a Disney film but more grown up.  I would say it is worth renting.

I bought a size up. Although I am a extra small in most American manufacturer size rating systems, I bought the small because I wanted to have some space for layering. The fit was as expected for me. I am 5' 2" approximately and 110 lbs approximately. The fleece was soft and comfortable, even in chilly weather. I found it to be pleasant to wear during the morning as well as the evening. Because of the neutral grey color, I am able to wear this with a lot of my regular clothing. The only thing I do not like is the fact that the pockets have zippers. It's useful because it lets you hold in small items in your pockets, but it is rough on the edges. If you like putting your hands in your pocket, this may not be ideal for you. Of the fleece that are available on Amazon during the time of my purchase, this was one of the most highly rated and stylish looking.

These tabs are quickly becoming my favorite. I love the fact that the price point as an add on is very reasonable (less than $4 at the time of my purchase) and the pack includes a variety of flag colors. There is a decent quantity compared to other packs by the same company. The 3M brand seems to be more durable than some of its knock off competitors. I find the adhesive to be of appropriate stickiness, so that it does not seem to cling too much to my book or note pages. When I buy the cheap flags, they tend to rip the ink off or tear the pages of my notes. Therefore, I am sticking with 3M from now on. The size for these tabs is on the smaller size but since I am just using these as literal flags and not using them to label I am fine with the size. Be sure to read the dimensions before you buy.

I just got the chance to use this Kleenex. It helped to have this pack around. The colors of the box are classy enough looking that they blend in with more elegant dcor. Also, the soap itself is very thick and soft. It does not tear easily, unlike some generic brands. The ply count is higher than normal. I found this a positive feature since when I blow my nose a lot, the skin around my face can become otherwise very sensitive. I would recommend this to other people who keep forgetting to buy tissue at the grocery store.

I finally got the chance to use this paper soap when I went BBQ-ing at a park on Memorial Day. This soap is unlike others that I bought in that the sheets are thicker and the soap is actually sliced into the sheet. It is not paper that has soap woven into its threading. As a result, the sheet itself is thicker than some other paper soaps. The soap slice takes a longer time to dissolve, but at least you know when it does, it is all soap. The variety pack comes in neon colors but the scents are not too obnoxious. They are innocuous to smell. I found this carrying pack very useful. Each different scented soap was individually wrapped in a plastic pouch, which made it easy to divvy up and carry. I split this soap pack with some family members. For those new to paper soap, the price point at $12 for pack of 6 is a pretty good deal.

This book reminds me of Clueless (from the 90s) and Cinderella, all mashed up together, in an awesome modern way with a fresh voice. Kasie West has true talent when it comes to story telling. Even though the framework of the story could easily become trite because it is one of those common setups, the characters have depth, humor, and personality. You end up rooting for them, cheering for our protagonist, and swooning over the love interest. All the characters are believable. The story reads quickly for those who like teen romance.  The action happens quickly. I would definitely recommend this book to those who like this author's work.  I prefer this to some of her earlier work.

This product is exactly as described. You get 50 split key chain rings. I got this because I wanted a new keychain. Then, I got this crazy idea that I would manufacturer my own custom key chains on etscy or something with the rest.  The quality of these chains are good. I think the price is fairly reasonable. If you need these for a hobby, you can get a decent  50 pack here.

It is just like what he uses on his show. I know he should promote his own tools, since he puts his name on it. But I think I have seen him actually use this. It is very handy in that it comes in a water tight capped tube that hangs over your neck. You can carry this easily. I think that this product is actually one of the higher rated ones of the kind on Amazon.

I got this as a present for my brother. I know. You may think that is a weird present. But we like to prepare for all eventualities. This is just a really cool product. You can use it to filter any kind of water (obviously of microbes not of chemicals). Chemicals are smaller particle sizes. I think life straw is a genius invention. It comes quickly and looks as pictured. I think the price has gone down from when it came out initially. Having something like this might complete any prepper emergency pack you want to make. Ya know, just in case

Great scouring pad. Dobie is a good pad. My mom uses this to scrub all her dishes. It helps get away grime. You do still have to use soap and apply some pressure but the Dobie helps do the rest. The rough surface easily shreds through caked on baked goods or foods. Pots and pans can be made clean much more easily than with just a soft sponge.

High quality download of great motivational workout song. I got this download from some sort of free rebate that I won from Amazon. I am not sure how I got the rebate. Anyways, this song is really high quality. It is extremely famous. It will pump you up before a work out or if you are getting ready to face an insurmountable task.

It's expensive per ounce, but it works and it tastes fine. Because of my skin tone, I need to have whitening tooth paste. Otherwise, my teeth look really yellow. I like this brand and toothpaste. I have decided that I do not need to bleach my teeth anymore. I can just use the whitening tooth paste and it seems to be able to help maintain the color of my teeth. It may also help that I have purchased an automatic toothbrush. The dentist thinks my teeth and gums are good now, when before when I used a regular toothbrush and toothpaste - they were atrocious.

This product came quickly and was packaged well. It looks sturdy and is easy to hold. I find this useful for cleanly wiping away marks. I like the pen shape. Staedtler makes solid products. I put them right up there with Pentel.

I love this humidifier. Ever since I started using it, I have slept so much better. I wake up much less in the middle of the night. My throat is not scratchy or itchy anymore. I previously was having terrible humidity in my bedroom. I didn't realize this could make me have such bad sore throats because I never use to have these problems. I just thought old age was getting to me. Then, I heard from a doctor that if you don't have proper humidity you can have all sorts of nasal passage discomfort. I checked the humidity in my bedroom and it was a whopping 30% (super low). I decided to give this humidifier a try because it had a good price point. I just wanted to test and see if humidity might help my condition. AND, the end result is the $30 I spent for this unit was so worth it.  Prior to purchasing this unit, I went on Amazon and did an extensive review of all the humidifiers that are being sold. Of the ones currently for sale (through March 2015), this was the cheapest one with the highest rating. All the other cheap ones were only 4 stars. All the other 4.5 star ones were really expensive, like double the price at least. I just wanted a starter unit that looked good and was easy to operate.  I am VERY pleased and will be recommending this to all my friends and family.PROS:*inexpensive*easy to use: start, fill and clean*attractive*made by a reputable sellerCONS:* none that I can think ofThe unit does glow a little and make a bit of a faint 'white noise' but I don't think that this would be a significant problem for most people unless you are ultra sensitive to light and sound or something. I found this to be nice and almost soothing background noise. I like very much how you can see the mist come out if you put it on high setting. As other reviewers stated, this unit does not hold much water, but I don't find that to be a problem because I empty and refill it every day (for hygiene reasons) and that is super easy to do.

You need a minimum of 8 people to play this game. Not by the instructions but if you want it to be fun. It is only interesting if you are playing against people you don't know that well. If you play with family members, you will probably be able to guess the answers. I got this game based off a recommendation from a coworker. When I tried to play it with 3 other family members, the game was not fun at all. It was too easy to guess. It was not for lack of trying to make it fun. The answer choices were very obvious even if we tried to disguise our personalities. You really need a large group or people you don't know that well to have fun. For that reason and also the high cost of this game, I am giving it only three stars.

This was my first short story.  I really liked the intro. It sucked me in from the beginning and the story itself was interesting and engaging. Except, it didn't really end what a satisfying conclusion. I think the story could have ended in a more impactful way. Instead, this story kind of made me feel really depressed about what happened. I left feeling hollow.  I think the descriptions of each of the characters and the writing style was well done and not clich. But it lacked the oomph a lot of really impactful short stories have.  For instance, in the Lady or the Tiger - one of my favorite short stories, I am left wondering long after what happened to the characters.  This - just made me feel really bad for the characters - all around.

Ridiculously addictive and can be played in many different ways. You can play it the standard banana grams way or you can try variations where you can 'steal words from other people'. Really, the game is a bag of word blocks. What you choose to do with them is really up to you. The price for the banana is good because it has a lot of letters in it. I think it holds more than the apple and the pear version do. You will have fun with this game if you like games that are similar to Scrabble. It involves speed and some vocab.  You can getaway though with knowing less words than in Scrabble. All you need to be able to do is spell the few words you do know correctly quickly.

I absolutely love this card game. It's so funny.  You have to play it with a group of people. The more creative the people are the more fun. It is a game where you basically bluff and try to bluff the best. This would appeal to those who like to play 'nerdy trivia type games' with a twist. Basically, the premise is as follows: you are dealt a card. On the card will be a choice of categories. You may be given a word or acronym or a movie or a law. On the back is the correct definition, meaning, plot, or tenet.  You make up fake answer choices and ask your opponent to guess which one is the correct definition from the list of fakes you've given. If you can fool them, then you get extra points. If they can still guess the correct answer, then they get the point. It is a race to the finish. Never has lying been so rewarding. The cards from this box set are numerous and have a wide variety of trivia. Even if you play against a genius, they are unlikely to know all the correct answers. Therefore, they must rely on their deductive reasoning.PROS:* good clean fun* clever and more fun with clever groups of people* lots of repeatability due to high number of cards and categoriesCONS* need at least 2 to 4 players

I finally got to this book and finished it. It's very short and reads quickly. The only thing I didn't like is that it is not as interesting as Cinder, Scarlet or Cress. The beginning starts off promisingly enough. However, I found Levana to be unsympathetic. I would rather she be completely cruel and cold and calculating from birth rather than a lonely person who was abused and warped in her own self-destruction. There were many shocking plot twists though, which I did not necessarily see coming. However, because Levana was so unlikeable I found this difficult to read. I found that I could not have much empathy for her because of her poor decision making. To me, she seemed to be the architect of her own misery. AND - in real life, I hate people like that.Queen Levana as you know her in the other books is much more interesting. She is cruel and barbaric. She is calculating and shrewd. I see that many people like this book because it fleshes out her backstory and gives rationale to her behavior. But I think it would have been more interesting if Levana had some redeeming qualities -- ruthlessness or cunning. To me though, her ruthlessness was stupid. In that she would do things that didn't really help her achieve any of the goals that she desired. I would have liked to see her either have more dimension or be depicted as unstoppable and someone to fear.Instead, I felt like she was just a tragic monstrosity. She seemed to have been victim to bullying and abuse by a cruel sister. Possibly, she suffered some kind of mental damage as a child. And, she always felt sorry for herself. I mean--- the same exact thing kind of happened to Cinder but Cinder decided to be a good person instead.So, for me I would rank the book in the series in the following order:CressCinderScarletFairestAlthough Winter has not come out yet, the first 4 chapters are included in this copy of Fairest. I would say that Winter and Jacin have a very promising storyline. I look forward to that still although I was unfortunately greatly underwhelmed by Fairest.

This product ships quickly with Amazon Prime. It had a label that says it is fresh for a couple of months. The taste is decent. It is what I would expect for fish floss. I eat this white rice. The flavor could be enhanced a bit more with maybe additional seasonings, but it seems to be a good quality product. Getting fish floss is pretty hard for me locally, so it's great that Amazon offers this.

Way better than my previous dryer. I was cheap. I was trying to save money for a while... in the worst ways possible. I ended up buying this $11 dryer because it was cheap.  And for a year, I went around with wet hair. I tried to tell myself that it was okay because of all the money I was saving. But it did not feel okay. I finally ended up getting this dryer though and it was like night and day. This dryer works so quickly. It makes you save time and time is the most precious resource of all. It will dry hair quickly and efficiently.  I do not use any of the attachments that come with it. But if you style your hair, just know, those are options too.

Ok, I am going to throw out all my old socks. I have been a sock horder before but now I have found the kind I really like. I really don't know what I am going to do about my other socks.  These bamboo socks are just SO comfortable. They feel like silk on the skin. I barely feel like anything is there, except they make me feel warm. They also don't smell because bamboo is a natural anti-biotic. I love these socks! The only thing I wish was that they would come in other colors.

I bought this as a gift for my sister. She loved it. It is a DIY canvas that comes folded with a set of paints. The painting is a bit more complex than standard DIY paintings but the final product has a lot of gradations in color. It is one of the more unique ones that are on sale on Amazon. This fabric does not come with a frame. You would have to buy one yourself.  Also, some other reviews of the same companies products did post some customers complaining about the fact that this comes folded. I think you can iron the creases out or just put heavy books on it for a week or so and it should flatten out.

These socks are exactly as pictured. They come in the colors as indicated. The fabric is soft enough. It does not pill when washed. The only reason I am taking off a star is because they don't have much breathability. They are not that bad but I don't think you should wear them too long if you are worried about being able to aerate your skin.

I wish I could get a refund for this.  Seriously, I thought it was that bad. I don't think I can finish it. I really wanted to like this book because a couple of my friends recommended it to me. But seriously... it's bad. Like really bad. And I like most books.  :(  If you are on the fence, I highly recommend you take advantage of Amazon's peek inside the book program or borrow it first if you are Prime member. Do not leap in and buy this. Because you will either love it or possibly totally hate it and be upset.What annoys me about this book is that it tries to present itself as something it is not. Although the introduction goes to great lengths saying that this book is just simply trying to show the economics of things around the world, everything drips with inflated marketing.  A lot of the stories and examples start off with promise but go now where. They just end up with really shallow observations.Example:1. Prostitution will not go away because there will always be a market for it. - There, now you don't have to read that chapter.2. Suicide bombers do not buy life insurance because they expect to die.  - There, now you don't have to read that chapter.The WHOLE book is like this. It's annoying.  I feel really jibbed out of $8.  Also, I found some of their conclusions (ex why drunk walking is more dangerous than drink driving) to be based on flawed logic and mathematical error.  So, that pissed me off from the start. Also, I found the writing style to just jump around randomly like stream of consciousness. It was tough for me to follow.

I love this movie. I think its hilarious. It's a parody of all the slasher movies ever made. The best part about it is it doesn't try to be cheesy. All the acting is done supremely seriously, which makes it so fantastic. Every single trope that is seen in a horror flick makes a cameo. There are the partying teenagers, the hot chick who wanders off in the woods, the usual suspects. But all of the characters have a unique twist to them, especially Tucker and Dale. No matter what you think will happen, you will probably be wrong.

The price here on Amazon is good for this product. These noodles are really famous in Korea. You can get them in specialty stores here in the US. I have even seen them make their way into some American chain stores with large international sections. The spice factor is pretty intense but you can adjust how much spice their is by moderating how much of the packet you put in to the bowl. These noodles are extremely flavorful. They have a spicy, rich savory flavor with just the right amount of balancing sweetness. It is a great ramen product. You can see many people also feel the same way by the number of 5 star ratings this ramen has. It is much more exciting than the traditional cup of noodles. If you are looking for an exotic ramen, this is one of the best.

These bags look just like they are pictured. You get a set of three of varying size and color. The mesh is fine and porous. You put your delicates inside and then wash. You can use these to separate such things as bras from your regular wash. This prevents the straps from getting stuck on the rotors. I found this to be at an acceptable price. The bags do feel somewhat delicate. As other reviewers mentioned, they may break. I am not surprised by this because they were not very expensive and the mesh material is very fine. I would recommend you put them on gentle cycle only if you plan on using them in your regular wash. For their purpose, I find these useful.

I believe this masks the odor but does not eliminate the bacteria. The smell is REALLY strong. It smells like toothpaste that has been put on steroids. My entire foyer actually smells like peppermint from just one spray of my shoes. I personally do not have a problem with normal peppermint smell but this is really strong, even for me.  Another female reviewer had made the same comment earlier. I had disregarded it because I thought that maybe she  just had a sensitive nose. I can say that while I do have a slightly more sensitive nose than other people, if you do not like the smell of peppermint, you probably would not be able to tolerate this. Also, the spray needs to be continuously applied. It overpowers other odors but I do not believe it removes the source of the odor. My feet still smelled even though my shoe was sprayed and didn't smell.

This zip up is very soft and looks just like the picture. I just wanted to note for others that this is actually small. I am a petite female. Normally, I wear Target size XS and Old Navy size XS. However, this warm zip is a bit tight. It is fine because it is a bit stretchy but if you want to look good, I recommend you either do a lot of crunches and have flat abs like the model in the picture or you buy a size up. I am still keeping the one I got because I already threw away the packaging material that came with this. Otherwise, I might consider returning it. I can still wear it around the house. Maybe it will motivate me to get flatter abs. Overall though, the hoodie is made of nice material. It is plush against the skin.

Ok, I was not sure what to expect. It has been day 1. But my FEET don't smell anymore. This is great. I was kind of skeptical when I opened this product and tried it. The instructions were really simple. The package comes with just one pair of socks and a single dose application. Basically, you rub this white talc lotion on your feet, throughout the soles, after you have taken a bath and dried your feet. You have to make sure you get the entire foot covered. Then, you put on the pair of breathable socks and take a nap. You sleep with the socks and the lotion on for a night. Afterwards, you wake up and wash the substance off. Your feet won't smell anymore.  I am planning on looking up each of the ingredients later. I can update this review if anything changes, but right now I am very happy. I feel like I should post a review since not that many people posted a review so far on this product. It totally works +1 day.  It is easy to use and its not too expensive. I would give it a shot if you have smelly feet and want a quick fix.

This case is beautifully finished. It is a nice black leather with a semi-glossy matte finish. While the outside is smooth, the inside is soft and plush. It is gentle to the touch without pilling. The case opens very easily and your iPhone 5 can slide right in to a nice felt like material. On the case itself, there is etched, very subtly an attractive Roman soldier type design. It's very classy looking. Most people probably could not tell the difference between this case and other more expensive standard luxury leather cases. It's a good value and also has added health benefits. I primarily got this case for protection from electronic radiation, as close contact radiation is the most dangerous type.  I plan on getting some more for my family members.

I am shocked!  My feet have never been so soft, even when I was a baby. I use to have really gnarly looking heels. Not sure when my feet turned green and yellow and crackly. I am pretty young still. I am in my early thirties, but if you had seen my feet a month ago in a lineup you would have thought that was really disgusting. You may have wondered what kind of lifestyle I led, which made my feet so calloused.  Also, at some point, over the years, my feet started to smell. -- And I mean SMELL BAD.I started panicking. I didn't want the trend of bad feet to only get worse. I mean, I was only thirty for crying out loud. If this was the state of my feet then, what would it be like in a decade?  Thus, I did a frantic internet search for foot deodorizing products and feet related products. My goal was to just buy as much of 5 star reviewed foot related items as I could, and try them all. I didn't care which worked. I just needed something to. But, in the end, after reading so many mixed reviews about so many products, I ended up only picking this one and one other.The other one is a shoe deodorizer.  It is meant to remove the stink. This one though, actually promised to get rid of cracks. I am not sure if the cracks were the homes of where the bacteria that lived in my feet lived but I do know that this product removed the cracks and now my feet are soft and do not smell anymore. I will DEFINITELY reorder this when I run out.  This product may have somewhat ugly packaging (bright blue with orange font that says FEET on it) but it works like magic.To use it, I just followed the instructions that are on the jar. Every night for a week, I would rub some on the cracks. Within the first 3 days, I started noticing improvement. Within a week of application (every night), my feet look like Cinderella's. I am so happy. There is a reason this product has like 1000 five star reviews. This stuff WORKS.

I bought this for studying, even though I am an adult. I didn't want to waste paper. I kept hovering between getting the more modern version (2.0 with removable battery) and this older model. The 2.0 version has options for you to replace the battery when it wears out. It is only one dollar more expensive. The reason I did not get this and instead opted for this older model is because the comments on the newer version stated that the stylus was less easy to handle (more fat).I am using this to study for a biochemistry graduate school exam. I have been using this to draw structures and reaction mechanisms. It is great in that I feel like I am saving a lot of paper and I don't have to run around my house with mounds of paper. I like how I can conveniently carry it from location to location without adding on too much bulk to my already enormous study materials.The writing is very easy. It feels like a normal pen. You just press fairly lightly onto the boogie board and the board will get marked up. The width of the writing is similar to that of using a felt tip marker. The only disadvantage of the boogie board is that you cannot erase part of the writing you make, to erase, you need to clear the whole board. That's fine though if you are okay with crossing out your mistakes. I do not think this is a total replacement for paper but this is a good tool to use if you want to practice on a board without generating too much paper waste.It is not a substitute for a paper notepad, but I think it can be used as a great supplement to aid your studying- even if you are an adult.

I carefully read all of the reviews on here, because that is how choosy I am when it comes to online clothes purchases. Following the instructions of other reviewers, I ordered a size up and it fits as expected this way.  Normally, I wear size smalls.  Therefore, I ordered size medium and it fit snuggly.These go great under your normal work clothes. I find that the thermal underwear helps transform my wardrobe to be multi-seasonal. Pants that I usually wear in fall and spring now can also be worn in winter. The thermal layer goes underneath and the pants just pull on top. Because the thermal underwear is shorter and more clingy than normal pants, you can hardly tell if you have both on.  My legs stopped being cold in the snow.Previously, I was trying to find thick pants. But I found a better solution. I can wear fashionable normal pants and just slide these on underneath. I chose to get the grey colored ones originally (which look nicer than the coloring on here in the photo, in my opinion- the photo makes them look greenish) and now I am back to purchase the white ones.

I didn't actually think it was possible but I got this ping pong racket anyways. I read a lot of reviews about how this paddle would make you a better ping pong player. To me, it seemed like hype or maybe even some kind of weird placebo effect where people who buy really expensive goods think they must have inherent virtue by being expensive (Velben good).  But, I tried it... maybe I am brainwashed. I don't know but I would swear that this thing has made me much better at Ping Pong. Not only is the pressure in my hand relieved. I feel like I have a lot better control of my swing. When I try to aim a ball in a certain direction, it is much easier for my hand and physics to get along. I have noticed a vast improvement in my game. There are people I play against who are way better than me, but this paddle makes me more confident and more in control. I would recommend this to others.

This treadmill is heavy. Like, super heavy. Unless you have the strength of 3 men, I highly recommend you get a partner to help you set this up. The package arrived very quickly from Amazon with Prime Shipping. The box, as other reviewers stated, comes punctured. The side will have a hole in it. I suspect this is from the forklift that they use to move this package in the warehouse, where it is distributed. It is too coincidental for all the packages to have a giant hole in them. Although there was a hole in this product box, the inside of mine was perfectly in tact. The treadmill took some work to assemble. I estimate it to be approx. 1-2 hours to put together. It will take longer if you argue. The actual assembly is not too difficult because it is pretty intuitive. The final product looks just like what is pictured on the product image. The fully setup up treadmill is pretty narrow, relative to other treadmills. Therefore, if you have wide feet or an especially wide girth, you may want to take that into consideration. Otherwise, for narrower people, this is not too bad. It may take some adjustment because it is slightly different from the more expensive high end treadmills. The treadmill itself is automatic. It has a plug that takes standard outlet electricity.  You can vary the speeds somewhat. It has all the basic functions of a treadmill without any frills. There is no radio. There is no TV.  It is just a treadmill with a small holder for you to put a book or kindle or IPAD.  For a starter piece of exercise equipment, this is a solid product at a reasonable price.

I bought this to protect my lemon tree before I went to Japan for 2 weeks. This product actually worked pretty well. I had to use 2 of these to keep my lemon tree alive but when I returned the leaves were still blooming. I liked that this product worked as described. It was extremely easy to setup. The only thing I didn't like was that it can be messy. You have to put this in the potted plant then manage to get an upside down water bottle in it without spilling the water everywhere. I lost a lot of water trying to get bottles into the stake. Also, as a tip, I recommend you only put this in large plants. I tried this with smaller plants and it knocked over the entire plant. I basically killed one of my smaller bamboo plants because the water made the whole pot tip over. I would like if these came in a variety of sizes and had an easier way of attaching a bottle.

A little expensive for the size of the book but the Sesame Street products do tend to command a premium. I got this as a present for donation to a children's center who requested it. Sesame street is one of their favorite shows. I was hoping to get a nicer item for the price that I paid. However, this is a teething book and seems to be made of decent quality. Therefore, I expect it to last long. I just wanted to note that this book is very small and can be held in an Adult's hand.

Got this as a Christmas present for a friend. She loves it. It is beautiful and works as expected. I would recommend purchasing Cuisinart type products from Amazon since these types of kitchen appliance equipment usually cost more in retail box stores. For some reason, Amazon is able to offer better prices for this particular brand. I like the chrome finish. I would have selected other colors, but some colors cost more than the chrome. Chrome tends to match with everything, so I went with this instead. It looks expensive, which is important in gift-giving if you don't want to come across as a cheap-o!

This product is EXTREMELY small. It should be called MINI pocket guide.  It is about the size of an index card. I think the product dimensions could be more prominently labelled. That said, the reason I am giving this 3 stars instead of 4 is that I think this is more of a 3.5 ish score. I can't really decide. I decided to round down for now. The pocket guide does contain useful phrases. I wouldn't necessarily call this instant Japanese as much as a very condensed listing of common travel phrases. This can be handy but in the age of smartphones, you may be better off with a smart phone ap that can do the same thing faster, as you can look up the phrases faster. Or, you could even get away with just printing out on a sheet of paper some phrases you think you may use.  I did find that the phrases were accurate and the information in this guide was useful but I expect that of any book I get from Amazon.

I decided not to write a review until after my international trip (including multiple airplane flights, train rides, trolley excursions and bus trips). I wanted to make sure that this would hold up. It looked sturdy enough and the reviews on this website were good, but I wanted to be sure. I have bought stuff before on Amazon where there have been glowing reviews but since there were so few of them, it was hard to tell if it was a real review or not.The Samsonite S Cure is amazing!  It is pretty expensive compared to regular luggage but you are paying for a polycarbonate shell with no zipper. There are no external fabric parts! This is great because then you don't have to worry about microbes or moisture latching on to the surface of your luggage. If you are a germ phobe, this is a god-send. After my 2 week long international travel, where I dragged this suitcase through multiple cities *including some with stinky sewage in the streets*, this suitcase survived with only a few scuff marks, easily wash away able.  I just used disinfecting cleansing wipes to wipe the surfaces and wheels.The Samsonite S Cure Spinner 28 is large size. It is one-size, which meant nothing to me. But basically, if you want an idea of what it is like I highly recommend you get a measuring tape out and check the dimensions. It is huge. It was able to carry for me 2 weeks worth of clothing and all the gifts I wanted to bring back. I stuffed this suitcase to the brim and it still had no problems staying shut. The suitcase has great hinges. It also has 3 manual locks on it. You can be sure that if you can fit your stuff in this suitcase and the suitcase will close, your belongings are secure. The closures are very intuitive despite being unlike any other suitcase I have ever seen.Picking this suitcase out from baggage claim was super easy. This stood out right away. Also, I loved that it came with a sticker that said made in Europe. I like it when companies don't simply outsource to China because it is cheaper. Even though I am of Chinese ethnicity, I find a lot of Chinese products cost-cut in dangerous ways, especially for those that involve plastics manufacture.This product is worth the $230 after tax I paid for it.  Right now, the black one is on sale for $180!!! Ah, I wish I had gotten it for $180. But none the less, I will keep my 5 star review because I love how this product survived my horrid travel.

Got this for a recent tip overseas to Japan. Based on the reviews, I took a risk. Very few products, especially of this type, have perfect 5 star average ratings. I am glad I followed the reviews. The Victorinox travel organizer was exactly as described.  The picture and color are accurate. I chose the black one because it would ship fastest via Amazon Prime. The travel organizer is very sturdy and has a quality feel to it  I loved how there were numerous pockets. I could organize my coins in the inner zippered mesh pocket.  I could separate my currencies in two letter sized internal pockets. There was space for my credit cards and health insurance info. There is an external pocket even for putting passports and boarding passes for easy retrieval. I will look to this brand for other related products in the future. In the past, I have bought many of these types of products but this one is the best. After an approximately 2 week long trip, I am in love with this organizer and its utility.  The only thing I wish for were more variety to choose from. Maybe this organizer with a handheld strap on it so I could carry it like a purse.

The pictures inside are beautiful and colorful. The book is really well made. It was a great gift item for a dairy obsessed food lover. You can execute these steps easily. There is a reason the rating is so high for this product. It is well made and well thought out. I would buy this again for sure. The price at the time of my purchase was also reasonable. It was only about $12.

Because of the California drought I had to stop watering my yard.  The product was easy to use and in fact fun to do.Cut your yard first! No point in painting long dead grass.Read and follow the directions.Be very careful not to drip on unsealed concrete.  It stains instantly.I used a large sheet of cardboard for a straight edge to prevent getting it on the sidewalk.UPDATE 10-1-15I tried Enviro Color lawn paint. It wasn't as good.  The color was not as good a match and the thick pigment clogged my sprayer.  It took a long time to clean and it is still partially clogged.  I'd stick with the LawnStar product.http://www.amazon.com/Lawn-Star-Grass-Paint-fl/dp/B010OU2DZU/ref=pd_sbs_86_5?ie=UTF8&refRID=09G90Z5KCE6CGGSE6VCM&dpID=51vWqVdtyGL&dpSrc=sims&preST=_AC_UL160_SR160%2C160_

Incredible value, well packaged.  It's a particle board frame with a plastic protective cover.  For normal use it should stand up well.  I could have spent more than 4X this amount getting a real wood frame with a glass cover from a frame shop.
torch action doesn't blow out and gives a hotter flame for lighting candles

For the price it's pretty amazing. Good Quality sound, easy to use and options on how to give it a signal...blue tooth, wired or with a micro sd card.  Most impressed with the speakerphone option.  It makes you realize the poor quality phone sound that you get use to is because of the crappy speaker in your phone.
Great fit, comfort and quality

Easy to assemble.Works great.  I live 32 miles away from the transmitter in Los Angeles.  High Definition channels are amazing.  Much better than Verizon FIOS.I experimented with the position of the direction.  Its works well even when it isn't aligned directly to the transmitter.
Not great quality.  I know they were cheap,but one shoe has a very noticeable lump in the bottom.
First season was better.  Killed off to many people and the story became dark.
Without a doubt the best battery purchase I've made for my S4.  Batteries last long and even without a charger they are a great deal.
Low quality maps.  I was expecting better.
Very happy with quality, fit and design.
Got it as a gift for my son.  He loved it.  Now he can be away from a full size monitor and use his device.
I buy them 6 at a time. I crush or lose a pair it's no big deal. The optics are dark and clean. I like the grey ND instead of green color.
Incredibly well done. Particularly episode 6 directed by Alan Poule.
I've purchased several of these for work and home.  BlueRigger makes the best quality at a reasonable price.
Easy to set, see and use.  I like the battery backup.
I purchase Anker products all the time.  The offer a good price on a quality product.  I've never been dissapointed

I've had in with absurd prices on cocktails at restaurants. In LA it's typical for a mixed drink to run over $12 each and sometimes near $20.  If I go out with friends for dinner I fill this flask with vodka. I order my first cocktail.  After that I order tonic water and supply my own happy juice.  The black is more discrete that a shiny silver flask.This flask is of acceptable quality. It doesn't leak. It's not a precision work of Swiss engineering and milling. The black is shrink wrapped on.

Fresh product that endured the shipping.  When I buy these in the standard roll they always end up destroyed in shipping.  I didn't have the same problem with the mini roll.  I'll mow down a full roll in a blink of an eye.  The small roll also helps me portion an appropriate treat.
It looks great and works as hoped.  I fill it with Ice water and don't have to worry about the table getting wet with condensation.
For a dollar more I could have purchased 2 new toothbrushes.
Awesome life time lasting hair brush.  The bristles smoothly release tangles.
I was fooled by the Green Glow in the picture.  This unit is battery operated.  You need to press a button at night to see the time.

This think works well. You need to hold the bottle at a steep angle to get the full effect. It stays seated in the bottle.  It also has an added advantage of being dripless.  I would repeat the purchase.
I am very sensitive to the blue/green color of CFL and other LED lights.  These bulbs do not have that issue.  It was a good deal and I would repeat the purchase.
I wouldn't repeat the purchase.  They are now made with thick non-absorbent polyester and don't feel very nice.

I have VOIP Ooma phone service and paid for their upgraded telemarketing blocking list for years. I am on the National Do Not Call list but local telemarketers are not covered by that legislation. It appeared to do very little in stopping the calls.  I was still receiving about 10 telemarketing calls a day.  I considered dropping my home phone service but there are times it's convenient to have a home phone.The Sentry worked immediately to end the calls.  It took me a few minutes to enter 5 numbers that I want to get calls from.For the aggravation this device is going to save me it's well worth the price.
Without a doubt the best Champagne bottle stopper I've ever used.  It's easy to use, quick, and works perfectly.  It makes the old school stoppers that hook on the bottle lip obsolete.

The worst free dating app you could use. I gave it a year as an upgraded member @ $80. In Los Angeles the quality of the women who used this site was very low. If you want to find someone with a neck tattoo this is the perfect place,  otherwise use OKCupid or Tinder.

I've owned at least 6 pairs of the S305 Headphones.  They are by far my favorite in design and function.  They bulk headphones I received from Park were defective.  Normally a new set of headphones will show a green status light when charged for a few hours.  These remained red after a day of charging.  I'm returning them.  When I find out how they handle the return I will leave seller feedback as well.

Good for getting a bottle of champagne somewhere while it's chilled as long as it isn't hot outside.  It doesn't have a lot of mass, or freezer liquid.  I'd say its best use is as a portable champagne bucket filled with ice
Get 20 oz. mugs for Moscow Mules.  Anything else is too small.  These are beautifully made and reasonably priced.
I don't know about cooling in a bottle in 5 minutes, but when placed around a cold bottle of Champagne and placed in a picnic cooler it keeps everything cold without the mess of Ice.
It's a very high quality knock off of the original.  Everything in the assembly is first rate.If you want to spend more than twice as much for the original you're wasting your money.
Looks pretty tacky in person.  I ended up not using it to hold the gift I planned to put inside it.

They are exactly what they are supposed to be.  They clip over the rod and roll easily with a shower curtain attached.  The finish was exactly as it should be...brushed nickel that was uniform in color.  The real review will need to happen after long term use.

My first purchase arrived and didn't fit my car even though the Amazon sizing guide said it would.  It appears that there were 2 mirrors for my model of car.  The company directed me to the Burco sizing guide online.  This should be the first step if you are considering ordering this replacement mirror.Once I had the correct size mirror all was well.I shimmed up the mirror housing with cardboard to get the spacing right.  Once you stick it on, it's not coming off in one piece so you have to get it right the first time.For the money saved it's a no brainer purchase.

Because of the ease of removing a car cover and the cost of replacing them using a lock is really not an option unless you keep your car covered in a garage.  The cable is coated to prevent scratching the paint. The lock is a good quality brass unit that came with 3 well fitting keys.I used a broom to push the cable under the car and was able to use the cable lock without getting on my knees.In reality the cable and lock could easily be cut by a determined thief.  This lock does prevent unplanned crimes of opportunity and is in my opinion worth the purchase.

The cover fits snugly but is easy to put on.  It is a perfect factory fit.  It came with a clear window that reveals the rear license plate.  Many cities require cars parked on public roads not to cover the plate.  If you consider using a cheaper cover this could be an issue for you if you plan to park the car on a public road.There is also a incorporated stuff sack that is located in the rear of the cover.  If you follow the provided instructions removal and installation of the cover is easy as long as it isn't windy.I'm very happy with the purchase and would repeat it again in the future.
It is a lightweight hoodie. Exactly what I wanted.  The construction is very good quality for the price. The hood is lined with Grey material that matches the drawstring and zipper color.
Nobody will ever see this review but I want the star count to reflect my satisfaction with the product.  It is worth every penny compared to the as seen on TV product.

After years of buying light sensitive screw in bases that failed after several months I researched this device and ordered it.Installation was easy, programming was easy,and I'm done.  After 3 weeks the timer has automatically corrected for daylight on a daily basis.It works and I don't have to think about it or come home to find the front door lights out at night or on during the middle of the day.It's worth every penny.
Perfect OEM fit.  OEM Color. OEM Quality.  What's not to like?  You would be a fool to make this purchase at a dealer.
Lightweight, solid, quick tripod...the only weak point is the ball head...but it can be replaced. If you are going to use this for SLR photography you should get a camera balance plate.

I used the Motorola 305 for the past 3 years.  They are far superior to these horrible headsets in every way.  Saving $20 cost me $25 for headsets that will be for emergency use only.Music sounds OK but people tell me that in conversations I sound underwater.

After watching Rick Harrison from Pawn Stars promote a single blade razor, I figured I'd give it a try.  I used it about 6 times and cut myself or didn't shave close.Plastic razors give me a much better and less bloody shave.
If you bought into the Zacuto system you know everything they make is top quality.  My experience with their support has been outstanding.

The product has a quality heft.  It should last based on my impressions of using it about 8 times.  Clean up is typical and the glaze is unscratched  after being cut in and served from.  I would buy it again.
For what you get it's expensive. Not padded in a meaningful way but everything fits.  I'd look for a different case.
Goes on easy, stays on, but isn't difficult to remove when you have to remove it for a battery change.I wasn't crazy about the color but it is easy to find when it gets set down in a random place.

These adapters are always getting lost from my camera package. I was glad to get them in bulk. If you go to a camera shop you are going to spend more for 2 than the 10 in this offering.  I have found when using them in heavier monitor adapters on Noga arms this type of adapter can crack over time. It's worth it to have some spares on hand.

When you ship or travel with your cameras you shouldn't leave the lens attached.  The lens sticks out like a lever and can cause damage to the lens mount or camera flange if it runs into careless handling or accidental dropping.  I carry my camera's in a Pelican case with dividers.  I have been using a Velcro soft wrap, but it is bulky and takes up a lot of space in my case. This neoprene sleeve offers good protection for cameras that are in a case. Leaving the cameras unprotected is a disaster waiting to happen.  Any number of small parts could work their way into the cases camera compartment and scratch up your camera or worse your display screen.Think of the investment as a $20 insurance policy.

When I opened the package I was shocked.  I didn't expect the superior quality I found for the price I paid.  Everything about the construction is first rate from the finish, to the quality of the materials including the zipper.I'm ordering a second one.  I'm afraid I'll never find something of this quality at this price again.

I ended up giving these Rally Knee Pads away because they were tight and uncomfortable.  I got the Asics Wrestling Gel Knee pads on Amazon which I love.  They are comfortable and offer good support and protection.ASICS Unisex Gel Wrestling Knee Pad

It's a great idea and it works like a charm. It's expensive for what it is.  Every time I use it, I think the person who came up with the idea is probably sitting on a beach sipping pina coladas.  I want to be that person who comes up with such a simple, cheap to make, and effective product.

These sleeves are a great way to protect your camera investment.  If you don't ship your cameras in sleeves, you are making a mistake.  All you need is for a random screw to migrate in the shipping case and scratch up your display to realize how important these sleeves are.They are not bulky like the 15" soft wraps I've been using.  This frees up more room in my Pelican case.This camera sleeve came up in a search when I ordered it for my Canon SLR.  With an Extended battery pack it's perfect but without it, the sleeve is too large.  They make a specific case for the 5D without the battery pack.  Don't order this one by accident...like I did.

I wanted a small filter case so I could pouch carry my cannon filters without cases.  A few days ago my B&W 82mm Kaesemann Circular Polarizer fell out onto rough rocks and marked the front of the filter.  It was my fault for not being more careful but you may want to consider this if you purchase this filter holder.  I'm still going to use the case but I'll be a lot more careful.

I wanted to give the product 5 stars to alert people that this is an outstanding value.  I use them in my 5Diii.  The battery gives information to the screen unlike other generics I've purchased.  It's a no brainer purchase.

The first time I installed a CF card I was concerned that the fit was too tight.  After a few uses the cards slid in without too much effort yet I had to be very careful to evenly push the card evenly into the reader.  This is because the card barely goes into the reader before it engages the contact pins.  If you push in a card  unevenly I feared it would bend the pins. I lent it to a friend and he returned it saying it didn't work.  I looked at the pins and they were bent.USB 3 compared to USB 2 transfer speed is jaw dropping.  Instead of spending 20 minutes transferring full 36G CF cards in takes 2 minutes.  At the end of a long shoot day, it's nice to be able to spend my time resting rather than transferring data.Recommendation:  Get a different reader.

I am a camera operator.  I'm 6'2" and have a more muscular than average leg diameter. Since I'm 50 it hurts to get on my knees for shots when I'm on blacktop or concrete.  I tried volleyball knee pads, they were uncomfortable.  Even the large size was too tight and cut off my circulation.These knee pad not only give padding while kneeling but the offer support to your knees and quite honestly feel good enough to wear all day.

I've been involved with motion picture camera work for over 25 years.  I have never seen a camera on a set used without an eyepiece chamois.  There are reasons for this.The chamois is much more comfortable to rest your eye area on.The chamois prevents light leaks that would cause you to see your eye reflection instead of the object in the viewfinder.It the days of film. the light leak would be transferred to the film.It needs to be installed properly.  The long empty end of the chamois slides over the eye piece first.  There is a YouTube video that demonstrates this well.  If you get it on properly it will never fall off easily. [...]
Not for adult male legs.  I'm a big guy at 6'2".  There is no way I could keep these kneepads on for more than a few minutes and keep blood circulating in my legs.

I bought 5 of these for my Pelican cases.  My heart sunk as my cases came down the belt at the airport and all the latches were all popped open on some of my Pelican cases.  When I got home I noticed that there were several items missing from the cases.  When the latches are opened there is enough room for small items in the case to be shaken out of the case.  It cost me several Go Pro accessories and camera filters valued at over $500.  For a suitcase these locks are fine but for small high value items in a Pelican case forget about it.

Liquids that get spilled near the stove enter the grates on the top oven and get trapped between the layers of glass.  There is no easy way to clean it.  The quality of the stainless steel is poor. It stains easily near the burners. The cooktop and front of range is EASILY scratched  The ovens take a long time to heat up. Two knobs needed to be replaced in the first year.  The rubber bumpers on the bottom of the cooking grates cost $5.60 each to replace.  The glue is $15 and the shipping is $10.  It is not covered by the extended warranty.  The extended warranty offered by KitchenAid on their website is from a 3rd party seller.  The sales literature leads you to believe it is from KitchenAid.  The warranty does not cover any parts that the consumer can replace themselves.  They consider practically all wearable parts as consumable and uncovered by the warranty.  This includes knobs, switches, dials, and buttons.Having a 2nd oven is great for Thanksgiving but for the cost of the product the quality should be much better.

I own 4 USB Chargers.  This is my favorite by far.  It is compact yet I can still get almost 3 full charges on my Droid Razor. The charging cable system make the most sense for anyone with a micro phone charger connection. To charge the battery You connect to a USB port on a computer to the micro charger input on the phone.  To charge the phone you simply flip the cable and come out of the battery USB to the phone.  My other chargers Use a USB to USB connection, a special USB to proprietary connection or a purpose built wall wart charger.  You only need to carry one cable with the Romoss charger unless you have an I-Phone. I also like that it has a built in flashlight.

This battery seems to work better than the OEM batteries I own.  I'd even say the case is better quality than the OEM case.  I bought this and another OEM battery at the same time on Amazon.  I prefer this battery over the "Motorola" battery I bought which I am not convinced is a legitimate Motorola battery.
The product works.  I ended up buying thispack of generic foam pads cut to fit the C3 filter.  They match in size exactly and seem to work the same.

The product is not as advertised.  I posted a picture from the back of the bag listing the seed types. It contains ARC, Blackjack and Kenblue. I can say that the seed germinated and sprouted in two weeks which is very fast for a bluegrass variety.  It appeared to have a high germination rate.

It's very easy to set up time lapse shots with this device.  I have a Nikon D90.  The cord plugs in to the bottom port on the side of the camera.  Pick out your interval, set number of shots you want 1-999 or infinity, turn off annoying timer beep, press start.Turn off Auto Focus or the camera will search for focus for each picture.  This will run down your batteries more quickly when the focus light fires before each shot.The unit comes with 2 charged AAA batteries.  I read a review that said the batteries were not charged.  (In the wrong way possibly?)Another reviewer stated the interval beep couldn't be turned off.  On mine it could be. (last setting in the menu)Minor ComplaintsThe default setting is 1 picture.  It should be infinity.The screen light powers off after a second.  It would have been nice if it stayed on longer or could remain on till turned off.The case is not very heavy duty.For the price you can't do better.
This was the song they played on Jimmy Kimmel and on a Honda commercial on YouTube. What a great band.

Bought for a still shoot rather than using seamless.  It's less reflective and gives better results than paper.  Best of all, it's reusable.The stands are light duty but usable.  I would have liked it if the case would hold the screen as well as the stands.

My sense of smell is very acute.  I smelled this scent on a woman outside a fragerence store in Seattle and was drawn to it.  I immediatly purchased it for my wife as a gift.It does not smell good on my wife.  Instead of musky, frankincense, sandalwood notes it has sulfer tones on her. Do I let her give it away to a friend or do I wear it?  I still like to open the cap and smell it.

I purchase this battery to use on my Liliput 7" and 5" HD monitors.  I have found none of the construction issues that the #1 review complained about.  It is a good product for a great price.  I have purchased more after initially testing the product and only purchasing one battery.

This case is an excellent value.  It is easy to put the drive in and take it out.  The divided pouch is good for cables but I don't think I would ever consider putting SD cards inside like the #1 reviewer suggested.  I'd be worried they would fall out. Since there is no zipper the drive is padded all around and there is no place for it to get scratched.  I ordered one to check it out then I ordered 2 more.

We have an angora and a Pygmy rabbit. The litter box has helped contain their waste and makes cage clean-up much easier.  Since we have an angora we had to have a litter box with a grate. Otherwise everything would stick to its fur. The rabbits trained themselves in a very short time.  My angora's only complaint it the clip that attaches in the front of the box seems to provoke the rabbit to remove it and push it out of the cage.

I Got sick of holding the liftgate window of my car up with my head.  I replaced both at once because I figured the second lift was soon to fail.  Installation was easy.  Don't think about getting this done by a mechanic...the install was way too easy and the saving is too great when you buy on Amazon.

This Timer has a flat magnetic base and top which makes it perfect for time-lapse shots with a Go Pro Camera.The magnet is strong enough to mount it to a fridge door (unless the camera is mounted to it) This makes it easy to find rather than having to dig through a kitchen drawer.If you want a super accurate kitchen time get a digital.  Somehow my mom managed to make it through my youth with a mechanical timer.  This should work fine for most folks.

I transfer data regularly for business. I personally own at least 30 memory sticks. I purchased the AGFA thumb drive thinking it would be a quality product because of the AGFA name. I put the drive away in my drawer till I needed it 3 months later.  The drive was defective.  I contacted AGFA and received no response on warranty or replacement.  I would never purchase another AGFA product based on this experience.  Corsair and San Disk have great user support.  They have always got back to me in a matter of hours and the few replacements I'v had to make have been painless.

If you own a compactor this is the only way to go when buying bags. Having a large supply of bags ends the frustration of having to go to the Whirlpool store when you run out of bags These are the OEM bags with the x cut out for fitting the non-slip buttons on the compactor drawer. I've NEVER had one of these bags break or slip into the compactor when properly installed. There are 15" and 18" compactor bags so make sure you get the right size.The unit cost per package of 15 at my Whirlpool store is $14.95. They offer no discount when buying a case of bags. Plus my states 8.75% tax equals $16.26 per package. Plus the cost of gas to get to the Whirlpool store.The Unit cost per package from Amazon is $10.68. (no gas used to get to the Whirlpool store when shipped from Amazon)Buying these bags from Amazon is a saving of over 33%.
I was shocked when I saw how small this thing is.  If you have anything but good vision it may not be the best choice for you.

I think most people will be taken somewhat aback by Sentey's out of the box quality. With exceptional build quality usually left toward the 150$ plus headphone makers, these Thorx headphones are punching above their weight class.Goods: Build1) Overall appearance is quite good. With the brushed appearance on the headband and the attention to detail around the branding - even down to the colors chosen - the Thorx line is comparable to many in the higher market.2) The ear foam ear pads are both comfortable and great for sound isolation.3) Both functional and fashionable. The headband is the larger loop design but doesn't have that weird look like you're wearing a helmet.4) Recessed cable input. The recessed design makes for a more durable connection. If you want you can lay down with these on and not worry about the weight of your head bending the line input.5) Portable. With the ability to fold these in on themselves and the included hard clam shell storage case, these Thorx headphones are great for airplanes or long road trips.6) Earphone cable has included microphone for smartphone users.7) Comfortable clamping. The headphones are very comfortable when worn over longer periods. The clamping of the head loop is soft enough to not put too much pressure on your head or ears.Goods: Sound1) The bass is punchy, but not overpowered.2) The highs are steady, crisp and clean.3) Sound isolation is well done, but could be better with a softer ear foam.4) Clarity is great with a good offset with the lows.5) Volume max is good too, with clarity even in the higher range.Room for improvement:1) The ear foam could have been the softer style like the Brainwavz HM9 Hi-Fi Noise Isolating Headphones2) Break-in done at the factory. Out of the box the sound quality is good, but after a 24 hour break-in the sound improves a lot. I ran them at 75% for 24 hours on classical music.3) Although the build materials are good, they could be a little heavier. I'm not sure how long the lighter headband will last after being thrown around or how well they will hold up if you fall asleep wearing them. Something that will need to be tested over longer periods.Overall a great set of headphones that anyone would be happy with, especially for the price.*I received these in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

When asked to investigate the destruction of an artisan's fine wine collection, Agent Pendergast initially wants nothing to do with such a trivial crime, yet when he hears of some of the finer items in the collection that are still intact he negotiates a deal to help solve the crime in exchange for a bottle of wine. Together with Constance Greene, Pendergast sets out to solve the mystery and ends up taking on an even bigger quest when a century old skeleton is found within a bricked up wall.The first half of the book reads like most other Pendergast stories. The eclectic investigator sets out to solve a mystery with his usual flare of smacking down the local law enforcement types and educating the local hicks on the finer things in life. Many pages are dedicated to heightening the local cook's abilities, the local sheriff's professional etiquette, and general civility of the local folk. But surprisingly the biggest chunk of the book's first three quarters is a more passing of the torch to Constance Greene.Having taken a bigger role in the last book, Constance is back to aid Pendergast in his investigation. Along the way, Constance partakes in her own investigations and is tested on her findings and abilities later by Pendergast. For me anyways, the attention given to Constance reads like she is going to be a bigger figure in the future of Pendergast stories, a passing of the torch as said above.Having Constance play a bigger part leaves a little less room for the man we open the book for. Perhaps some readers will find this better as it brings a little more fresh air to a character that has become a little stale over the dozen plus books, but for me it really takes away from the man that makes me read these books. Perhaps like you, you believe the mysticism that the authors include in their stories is better geared to the challenge that faces the FBI agent. Yet in this tale, the magic and paranormal is reaching an all time high within our new duo.But even though the book drags on a little in the middle, most will find that the ending is quite enjoyable. Other installments have painted great endings and great cliffhangers as well, but this book's finale is quite surprising to say the least.Over all the book departs from the mainstay of the Pendergast franchise and reads like the author's are searching for something different to explore, but along the way there are some great scenes and fun voyages. For me anyways, I've enjoyed prior installments more. Good but not great.Three stars out of five.*I received this book in exchange for an honest opinion.

>Minor plot spoiler ahead<Summary:As a young boy, York Ballin knew the sting of rejection as his foster parents paid him little heed, and as he grew older the choices he made garnered him no more respect from society.
