Works with the brightness, volume, home button, and sleep functions as well, which is nice to have. I have only used it without charging it (since I got it) for about 12 hours and still going strong, so I can't say much about the battery life other than it's not a lemon. The keys are tiny, yes, and you might accidentally press the arrow instead of shift sometimes. But having a physical keyboard in my bag with my iPad gives me that added peace of mind knowing that, on occasions when I have to type a bunch of emails on the go, I won't be thumbing out letters or awkwardly dictating in public. My only quip is the little rubber sticker feet they include don't have strong enough adhesive to stay put when sliding around in my bag. Two weeks since I put them on, and they've all fallen off and there's a little sticky residue there instead. At least it doesn't slip on a table since the residue is there, haha. There are much better keyboards out there, but for the price and size, this one is hard to beat.

Yes, I put it on a Mosin Nagant like everyone else. Works great with the UTG tri-rail mount. Cheap setup but has held zero for about 30 rounds so far. Clear optics, includes see-through cover, and doesn't cost more than the gun. Recommended!

If you don't want to propane torch your WW2 relic to put a dovetail mount on, this may be the next best option. I have used the brass stacker one as well and this seems just as good for much less dough. I ended up taking the side rails off because I didn't want to put anything other than a scope on. Take note, the brackets that hold the side rails have sharp-ish corners that HURT LIKE THE DICKENS if you're not careful and grab your gun there. Other than that, it seems to be holding zero after 30 rounds and that cheap NCStar pistol scope. I ended up going all out with the archangel stock, bipod, and timney trigger. Truly a joy to shoot this gun now, and super accurate.

Solid product. I bought it for a Mosin Nagant, but my sight base is apparently soldered with that hellishly strong silver solder. I wasn't about to go propane torch all up on my nice Tula, so I settled for one of those UTG tri-rail mounts, which works better than expected. I ended up putting this mount on my Gamo Hornet with a UTG fixed 4X air rifle scope and that turned out to be a seriously awesome combination for the money. Now my .177 air rifle is almost more accurate than my Ruger 10/22 within 50 yards. Wut?
These are awesome... except for the text on them. Looks really cheesy with that. Otherwise, nice cheap batman throwing stars! Don't hurt anybody, please. Unless they deserve it.

Somehow I only had to pay 8 Georges for this iPad Air case, and I felt like a thief. It works great, and though the material seems on the cheap side, it performs admirably. It's not the perfect case, but then again, I paid 8 Georges. If you're looking for the best iPad Air case, this is not the one for you. If you're looking for the best iPad Air case for the money, your search is over.

Why Taurus ever put those stock hard panels on, I don't know. This is what the gun was meant to have. Feels better, shoots better, looks better, and as cheap as a box of ammo. Necessary upgrade if you have a PT-92. You will get three grips, use whichever left-side panel fits your gun (depends on safety lever position).

This product is one rattling buffer away from a 5-star rating. Really, that's my only complaint. I used it with a SigTac arm brace to make one heck of a sweet SBR... er... AR pistol. It was a pretty tight fit but nice and solid once on all the way. The included plate with sling loop is a nice touch. The weights in the buffer are apparently loose, but the assembly seemed to move quite smoothly. Cycled in my build with absolutely no hiccups. The price is fair enough. Recommended.

This is a solid piece. It does add some weight, but nothing crazy. I put it on a palmetto state upper with a midway AR stoner 7.5" barrel and the thing shoots like a dream. The nut went on just perfectly, with just the right amount of torque. The handguard has nice texture in the middle for a good grip. I did notice that after I tightened the tube down to the nut as much as possible, it didn't take much normal handling to start coming loose from the nut again. You may need a pipe wrench to get it really tight, or better yet maybe just some loctite. Either way, I'd recommend this, especially considering the price.

Brian is my favorite comedian. I have seen him live twice, and both times were non-stop gut-busting laughter. He is ALWAYS funny, energetic, and clean. I think the worst word I have ever heard him use is hell, so no big worries there.This DVD is no exception. If you have never heard him before, buy this. If you have all his other stuff, buy this. Somehow he is always the same goofy guy with the same goofy delivery, but it never gets old. His material always hits the funny bone for me.

It's nice to have a spare battery. This vacuum usually lasts long enough to do about 80% of my apartment, so I just switch it out every time I use it. Haven't had a problem with it through about 20 cycles so far.

This is one of the simplest tools you can buy, yet one of the most useful. I recently used it to take apart my Glock, and also to punch the pin out of the gas tube cover bracket on an SKS. The plastic handle is plenty sturdy enough to hammer. Recommended for any gun owner.

These are great. The little side of the brush is especially useful for cleaning slide grooves on semi-auto handguns. The wire brush does bend easily, which is extremely annoying, but I don't tend to use that brush very often anyways. A little angle on the end would be nice, too.

This is a solid upgrade for a Glock. It works perfectly and makes it so much easier to release the slide after a mag change. The finish isn't glossy like the factory part, though. Not a huge deal as it doesn't look bad and maybe provides a little more grip, but it's just not what I expected.
These seem a little bulky/heavy, but they work, and seem solid. The selection of screws is nice for either wood or synthetic stocks.

Few things in life are better than gourmet chocolate and Cailler LArt Du Brut Milk Chocolate Bar with Whole Almonds, Hazelnuts, and Cranberries is a chocolate bar made with quality in mind. The nuts, berries, and creamy chocolate make for a tasty after dinner or midday treat.I usually go for solid chocolate bars without any other ingredients, but I dont have any problem with the occasional deviation from my preference. This chocolate bar, with almonds, hazelnuts, and cranberries, offers a good tasting combination of ingredients that tastes better than expected. I wasnt so sure about cranberries in my chocolate, but the manufacturer makes it work. The hazelnuts and almonds are more pronounced and add more to the flavor than the cranberries, but the berry taste is still there, in a small but pleasant dose that contrasts nicely with the sweet chocolate.The nuts and berries are nice and add their own dimension of taste, but the basis of this candy is milk chocolate. Its creamy and smooth and it melts in your mouth the way quality chocolate should. The berries and nuts are actually softer than expected and, with the milk chocolate, make for a more delicate bite. And you can break the large bar into 12 small, bite size pieces, making it good for sharing.I love solid chocolate most of all, but I must say that Cailler LArt Du Brut Milk Chocolate Bar with Whole Almonds, Hazelnuts, and Cranberries is a very good alternative to 100 percent chocolate. The milk chocolate is still front and center, but the nuts and berries are tasty in their own right and make this a good- tasting, quality snack.

I love any snack that includes chocolate and Popcorn brittle with Hersheys milk chocolate drizzle contains exactly that- milk chocolate drizzled over a mixture of snack foods for an indulgent treat great for the holidays or any time. The popcorn, toffee, pretzels, and chocolate combine for a taste most anyone will like and many will get addicted to quickly.This snack food relies on gooey but hardened/set toffee to hold together what are actually large pieces of candy. I had no problem grabbing one of these big pieces of snack food and eating the full piece, but some may want to break the pieces down into smaller sizes. The manufacturer claims that this candy is sweet and salty and it is, but the sweetness is most noticeable. The popcorn taste is there, too, and it tries to balance things out, but its the least pronounced among the flavors and sweetness dominates.I like this food item from a taste perspective and Im sure that others will agree that the taste is pleasant and indulgent. My concerns with this snack food are more along the lines of the nutrition. The sodium level is significant, although not as bad as other snack foods, and there are a fair number of calories that add up quickly because the candy is so easy to eat. But worst of all is the saturated fat. Each small serving contains about 5 grams of saturated fat and, considering how easy it is to eat multiple servings in a single sitting, the saturated fat catches up to you quickly.Popcorn brittle with Hersheys milk chocolate drizzle is a tasty snack overall and it would make a great gift. I think its a little pricey and I am concerned about the level of saturated fat. But this is still a tasty snack and besides, the holiday season is meant as a time to indulge so go ahead and enjoy this pretzel, popcorn, chocolate, and toffee treat if you get the chance.

Homebrewing is a work of both science and art. Those new to the craft are usually content to learn the ropes and perfect a simple batch of brew using a homebrewing kit. But more advanced homebrewers want more, and one way to impress is by growing your own ingredients. Gardening for the Homebrewer is designed to aid the homebrewer in this important task.I have homebrewed beer in my day and I know that it can be a challenge to get everything just right. The addition of fresh ingredients is important and what could be fresher than growing your own? Thats what this book is all about. It steps the gardener through the process, from planting seeds, to harvest, to storage and beyond, with useful side tips and other advice to make your homebrew the best it can possibly be.One surprise with Gardening for the Homebrewer is that it isnt just about growing hops, barley, wheat, and other grains. It also has sections that cover growing grapes, apples, pears, and herbs. These sections are useful for those who wish to expand their horizons and produce their own wine and cider, or who would like to grow these ingredients to add to their own beer. There is even a section on making your own flavored liqueurs- something that, in turns out, is actually easier than it first sounds.I like how this book is written. I like the side tips that cover everything from pruning to cleaning and more. I also like the humor- you dont usually find humor in a gardening book, and it adds a nice touch. About the only thing this book could use is a conclusion. There is nothing to tie everything together at the end- the book just closes with a section on growing herbs.Homebrewing is a rewarding hobby. A great batch of homemade beer can be made even better with fresh ingredients and what could be fresher than growing your own? Gardening for the Homebrewer fulfills this purpose, showing homebrewers how to plant a garden of plenty to make the freshest, most natural beer possible. Even if you dont want to brew beer or make wine or cider, this is still a useful book that makes a great addition to the do-it-yourself persons library

Tissues are an essential item for home and office and Angel Soft is a brand I often turn to for my tissue and other bathroom needs. The quality of Angel Soft is good and the price is lower than most other brands- a combination that makes the brand a good choice in most instances.These tissues are more than good enough to satisfy most consumers. The tissues themselves are standard size and soft on the skin. They are not as soft as the tissues that contain added lotion or aloe, but they are still soft enough for most purposes. And the two ply design makes them strong enough to hold up to most noses.The other thing I like about this product is the package design, specifically the flat boxes. No, you dont get as many tissues with a flat box, but the design makes it easy to fit a box into a shallow desk drawer or other tight quarters. They work well in your car, too, and fit very well into the tissue- designated compartments common to some vehicles.Angel Soft Ultra Professional series products are designed for use in professional settings, but they can be used in the home as well. These tissues are as good as any other Angel Soft product and while the price is a little steep for ordinary consumers, it should fit within the budget of most businesses with no problem.

My girls love to ride their bicycles, but I have noticed that, gradually over the course of about a week, their tires lose a little bit of air. The leak isnt enough to warrant replacement tires/tubes, but the tires are in constant need of air and this compact pump from Kitbest is a good choice for the job.We have a couple different tire pumps in our household, but most are larger and bulkier- much more than is needed to pump air into a childs bicycle tire. Kitbest hand pump is noteworthy for its small size and it even attaches itself directly to a bicycle, so its always there when you need it. I would say the lightweight design and ability to attach to a bicycle are easily the devices strongest points.This pump is generally easy enough to use and it takes only a few back and forth pumps to get tires inflated and ready to go. One issue that I have with this pump, however, is the problem of getting it to firmly attach itself to the valves. I like that the pump has two different valve openings- one for shrader and one for presta valves- because this makes it more practical for general inflating needs. But getting the end of the pump to stay in place does take effort. If you dont get it right, you will know because you will pump and pump and notice that little or no air is getting into the tires. You will have to then unlock, reattach, and try again.Tire pumps are a necessity for those with bicycles and this mini pump from Kitbest is a good choice for most pumping needs. Like I said, the compact size and ability to mount it directly on a bicycle are its two strongest points. The problem with getting it to remain attached to a valve is not one to overlook, but it will work with effort and the pump has enough overall good qualities to recommend.Note: I received this product complimentary in exchange for an unbiased review, but I was not compensated in any way.

Living near the Gulf coast, we receive a steady amount of rain. An umbrella is essential, but most of my umbrellas have been confiscated by my kids and I never know where they are. They take an umbrella with them when it rains, but they never return it to the same place. I needed a new umbrella to call my own and I was happy when I got my hands on the Travel Umbrella, from Oak Leaf.This umbrella I have is is black and that makes it perfect for a professional like me who sometimes needs an umbrella traveling to and from work. It comes with a protective sleeve in which to store, but I find this is really not necessary since the velcro strap keeps it firmly closed when not in use. The umbrella features an automatic, push button operation to open and it opens up smoothly and without any assistance. The cool thing is that it also closes automatically, with the push of the button, so you dont have to manually pull it down from the center, like you do with other umbrellas.This umbrella isnt huge, but its large enough to keep you and possibly a young child safe and dry. The water shakes off quickly and easily so it wont take long to dry. The handle is a decent size, but it would be nice if it was just a little bigger, at least for me since my hands are larger than average.Overall, I find this a very good umbrella with good functionality and quality construction. Its compact in size so it fits into small spaces for storage and the manufacturer even offers a lifetime guarantee. Im happy with this umbrella overall and recommended it to any dad who, like me, needs a way to stay dry in the rain but finds himself without protection due to the constant needs and forgetfulness of his youngsters.Note: I did receive this product complimentary in exchange for an unbiased review, but I was not compensated in any way.

Dogs love to eat and they especially love any food thats meaty in aroma. Eukanuba Adult Hearty Stew with Beef and Vegetables in Gravy is exactly that- a soft dog food that is loaded with real meat and certain to get any dogs attention.Wet dog foods are loved by dogs and this food from Eukanuba is much like other canned dog foods in that respect. Even if my dog is in another part of the house, he will quickly come running if I open a can of dog food. A dogs extraordinary sense of smell picks up on the fragrant aroma of meat and soft dog food sends my dog running to the dinner table with tail wagging. My dog loves the taste of this food and eats with abandon when its served to him.Just like with other wet dog foods, I tend to limit this canned dog food and serve as a topper to regular, dry food. I serve it as a treat more than a regular food and the reason is largely due to the ingredients. I like that meat comprises the top ingredients and Eukanuba should be commended for added a good dose of nutrition to this food. However, there are some by- products and a scattering of other questionable additives. Its still a notch better than some of the cheaper brands of canned dog food but some of the ingredients could concern the more attentive and demanding dog parent.Eukanuba is a generally trusted brand and its Adult Hearty Stew with Beef and Vegetables in Gravy is a good choice in wet dog foods. You wont have any problem getting your dog excited about this and if you can get past some of the less desirable ingredients, you should find this a good canned dog food option.

Solid Gold is a unique maker of pet foods and this particular style, Lamb, Sweet Potato, and Pea Grain and Gluten Free, is a good example of what this company can do. Its a food with balanced nutrition and with an ingredient list that includes a wide array of food items beneficial to dogs and their good health.Concerned dog owners are fully aware of the unhealthy and cost- saving fillers that comprise a large percentage of most dog foods. Some of these ingredients in cheaper dog foods are questionable at best, scary at worst. A quick check of the ingredient list with this food shows that its much better than most, with lamb, lamb meal, sweet potatoes, and chickpeas at the top of the list. There are some less- pronounceable items in the ingredients, but they rank well down the line.Do dogs like this food? I cant speak for all dogs but my vizla/shepherd mix took to this food right away. He didnt need any encouragement to eat and finish his bowl and this was a relief, because Im never completely sure if he is going to accept some of these natural/gourmet dog foods or not. But he did like this one and its one I would obtain again.Not all dog foods are created equally. Some are much better than others and Solid Gold Sunday Sunrise Lamb, Sweet Potato, and Pea Grain and Gluten Free is definitely one of them. Its got many positive qualities and dogs like it- combination satisfying to both pet and owner. Yes, its not cheap but good dog food isnt and my dog is worth the added cost.

Im a chocolate fiend. I prefer chocolate to any other form of candy and will go out of my way to taste and enjoy any exotic or interesting form of this tropically- grown treat. Cailler LEcorce Dark Chocolate is one such treat- a chocolate great for snacking and indulgence.The first thing you will notice about Cailler LEcorce Dark Chocolate is that its flavor is less sweet and less smooth than other chocolate. Most of us are familiar with milk chocolate, which is creamier and usually sweeter. With Cailler LEcorce Dark Chocolate, you get a more bittersweet flavor that emphasizes pure cocoa. It might even seem a little harsh in taste for some people, but lovers of pure chocolate will find it delightful. And compared to some other examples of dark chocolate, this one is actually less harsh and a little smoother, although it is still not as smooth as the more common forms chocolate most of the public is accustomed to.This chocolate bar is flat, like a Hershey chocolate bar, but there is quite a bit of taste and calories packed into this small space. Purists, as stated before, will like it and appreciate that there are only a few ingredients: Chocolate, cocoa butter, sugar, cocoa powder, and vanilla extract. In fact, according to the manufacturers own numbers, this chocolate contains 84 percent pure cocoa. It easily comes through in the taste, which is chocolatey and natural, with only a few additives.Cailler LEcorce Dark Chocolate isnt the absolute greatest tasting dark chocolate I have ever tasted, but its easily above average and it will easily satisfy your chocolate cravings. Each bar is intended to share, but I usually indulge and down a full bar by myself. Its rich and bittersweet and a great chocolate indulgence for the chocolate fiends among us.

Everyone needs to keep food and beverages items cool at some point but when all you have is an individual lunch, a traditional cooler- even a small one- is more than necessary. You could just add an ice pack to your lunch box, but a better option is Packit Freezable Lunch Bag.I often take my kiddos to sports practices and we need cold drinks to get us through. This was enough to convince me that the Packit Freezable Lunch Bag was a good item to add to our household. And for our uses, it has come in very handy. You just stick it in the freezer and let it do its thing. The gel inside the walls of the bags freezes and is then ready for use. You dont need dig through the freezer in search of an ice pack because the frozen gel will do the work for you. Just remove from the freezer, unfold, add your food and drink, and zip shut.Packit has worked fine for our sports practice events because we are not gone for very long anyway. The only caution one needs to take is with extended time periods. If you take this to work, it should be fine keeping things cold for several hours, which is more than enough to get you to your lunch break. But if your lunch break is beyond, say, 7 hours from the time you leave home, the gel will likely have started to defrost and your items may not be as cold as you like. But even at this point, food and drink will likely still be cold enough to enjoy.The interior of Packit isnt very large, so dont expect it to hold more than approximately a single lunch. You also need to exercise some common sense and avoid leaving it in direct sunlight or inside a car because, if you do, the gel will defrost much more quickly. I cant judge the durability of this item because I have only been using it for a short time, but for my familys use, its a good, reliable, and useful aid to colder food and beverages and a convenient addition to our kitchen.

A good toy for those who like to create things,KNEX K-Force K-10X Building Set is your kids very own mini dart gun. Put the pieces together, aim, and fire the lightweight darts for some safe and entertaining fun.I have seen other guns made for firing darts, of course, but part of what sets apart the KNEX K-Force K-10X Building Set from the others is that kids have to put the machinery together before they can start blasting. It isnt too difficult, but depending on a childs age, he/she might need some assistance. If possible, let junior attempt building it at first. It does require some skill and it makes for a good lesson in mechanics.Once everything is assembled, the KNEX K-Force K-10X Building Set is ready to use. The set comes with five darts and the device is capable of shooting them a long distance. According to the manufacturer, they can travel up to 75 feet. This is quite a bit and it means that kids can take them outside and have fun shooting at various targets. The darts are soft and pose no threat of injury, so parents need not worry.KNEX makes several different building sets like this one. I havent experienced the others, but I can say that the K-Nex K-Force K-10X Building Set is a very good choice for harmless and active play. It encourages kids to get up and move around and the assembly is a good test of motor and other skills.

Ive always liked the Dummies book series and have found most every one of them useful as a reference guide and instructional manual. Juicing and Smoothies for Dummies, once again, continues my confidence in the Dummies series. Its a complete guide to turning your favorite fruits, vegetables, etc., into delicious, drinkable concoctions.Juicing and Smoothies for Dummies is great as a recipe book and I would bet that many people who get this book go directly to the recipe section and start juicing away. I like the different cross references for the recipes and the numbered, step by step instructions are perfect for those who want to get things right the first time. Each recipe ends with a nutritional breakdown and some of the recipes even have added tips, helping you get the most from your efforts.So, Juicing and Smoothies for Dummies has lots of great recipes but like other Dummies books, this one is much more than a one- dimensional source. The book talks about the health benefits of juicing; offers advice for finding the best juicer or blender; describes the proper technique for juicing; and even offers advice for recycling juicing leftovers. I thought I was already well versed on smoothies and health science, but I still found new things to learn in Juicing and Smoothies for Dummies. There is very useful advice throughout this book and most everyone who reads will discover something new.Fresh juices made from fruits and vegetables represent a great way to improve health and get the balanced nutrition we all need for good health. Juicing and Smoothies for Dummies is an excellent guide for this purpose and I like to keep it nearby for quick reference. It encourages fresh juicing and blending of fruits and veggies for improved health and with its endless tips and advice, its sure to improve your juicing expertise.

At-A-Glance Planner is a handy way to keep track of special days and appointments. Great for those who have busy schedules, it covers a thirteen month range and has decent size pages to fit everything you need into a designated place during the week.In my household, we have gone the way of electronic for most things, and that includes planners. We utilize an online calendar for our tracking and planning and for the most part, it works for us. But there is still something to be said about a book- style planner. Yes, its a little old fashioned but its nice to just grab a book when you want to consult what is planned rather than have to open up your laptop or ipad. At-A-Glance fulfills that need and my wife has already begun using it to schedule her work- from- home events.I like most of what this planner offers and I like that it is medium in size for easy transport. The larger planners, with standard 8.5 by 11 inch sheets, are too bulky. I also like that it has large spaces to include daily activities and appointments and the contacts info sheets are nice. Oh, and the holidays page is good because it reminds you of all the important days on the calendar for three years running.If I had to find some sort of faults with this planner, there would be two things. One is the days of the week- they are lined for better organization, but there are no pre- printed time blocks showing the actual times of day for you to fill in like you get with, say, a Franklin Covey planner. The other thing I dont prefer is the orange type on some of the pages. Black or blue would have been better, for greater contrast.Overall, however, I still find the At-A- Glance planner a good one for a persons individual organization and appointment scheduling. Yes, a paper planner is a bit old fashioned in todays tech age, but sometimes old fashioned is good and this is certainly true with a planner. Try it for yourself and get your own life in order.

Do your kids love anything Disney? My girls are Disney fanatics and anything with popular Disney characters on the package makes it an instant hit with them. Naturally, they like the Paper Mate Mates Mechanical Pencil Disney and they were happy when the package arrived in the mail. They opened it quickly, divided the pencils between the two of them, and proceeded to write.The Disney characters on these mechanical pencils add a degree of cuteness and likeability, but what about the actual quality of the pencils themselves? My girls told me they were good but knowing their bias, I had to find out for myself. And I have to agree with the kiddos- these are good mechanical pencils and are better than most. The first quality I like is the triangular body of the pencils. This is not only more comfortable between the fingers, its also nice because it prevents rolling. Round pencils tend to roll off of a table or whatever surface they are placed. These dont roll so easily, and that keeps them from falling on the floor.This set of pencils comes with a pack of replacement pencil leads and speaking of the lead, it is a little thicker than others. The added thickness means the leads are less likely to break and that means the refill package should last for a while. I like the two spare erasers also because, again, you are given what you need to make the pencils last longer than expected, without needing to make a special trip to the store for replacements/refills.Mechanical pencils have their advantages. Add to the advantages the likeness of popular Disney characters and quality construction and you have the makings of a very good pencil. Give a pack to your kids- they will be grateful for your kind gesture and will get writing right away.

Jewelry is one of the few items that is accepted by most any woman, so when I had the chance to get this sterling silver diamond accent necklace, I gladly accepted. All I had to go by was a picture on a screen and a fact list, but I was pretty sure the wife would like it so I ordered and waited for it arrive in the mail.As I expected, my wife loved this necklace and while she does own several others, this one does have qualities that set it apart. It has an attractive, shiny appearance and the double heart design is very nice. But I think what my wife liked best is the way the chain is attached. The manufacturer made it so that the chain is on the back, not looped through the middle of the pendant. That means the front of the necklace is always facing out, like it should be. You dont have to keep flipping it around, like you do with other necklaces.This necklace is on the short side and that means that, for most all women, it will position itself higher up on the neck, making it just right as an accessory for certain clothing. I dont claim to know exactly what it will go with and what it will not- I leave that up to the lady in my life, who has the whole jewelry thing and accessorizing process down pat.I like the sturdiness of this piece of jewelry and it does seem like it was made to last. And the price is more than fair for what you get. All things considered, I cant really find anything wrong with this necklace and my wife loves it, too. For the money, its going to be tough to beat and it gets a five star rating from me.

Computer screens, television screens, cell phone screens- they can all get dirty and they must be cleaned with care. A product specially made for the task is essential and Rogge Duo- Clean Screen Cleaner is a very useful cleaner for the job.I have to admit, I was a little hesitant to use this cleaner when I first received it. The reason is because I have heard of various cleaning agents that claimed they were made for these types of surfaces, but in fact were not, and ended up damaging or blurring the screen. When I received this product, I started by testing just a small section of my laptop screen. Once I determined it was safe, I went ahead and cleaned the entire surface.The results I experienced with this cleaner were remarkable. The screen looks shiny and is completely streak free. It looks just like it did when my laptop was brand new. I was quite impressed and proceeded to use it to clean my television screen. It was just as effective on that surface as well and it had me wondering why I hadnt tried a product like this much sooner!Using this product isnt quite as simple as spraying your screen and wiping. In fact, youre not supposed to spray your screens directly. You should instead spray the included cloth, wipe it across the screen, then turn the cloth over and buff. This will remove all of the liquid and leave a clean, bright, streak- free surface behind. Spraying directly and wiping would be a little more convenient, but its still pretty easy the way it is and it takes little time to finish.Electronics are part of most every household. They need regular maintenance and care and Rogge Duo Clean is a great product to get your computer, cell phone, television screen, etc., looking as clean as new. I am very satisfied with this product and definitely recommend!

Gourmet dog foods usually offer superior nutrition. Nutro Farms Harvest Small Breed Adult Chicken and Whole Brown Rice is exactly that- a gourmet food with a gourmet price and superior nutrition to match.My dog is on the small side and doesnt eat much, but we try to feed him only the best food and this dog food from Nutro easily meets expectations. Chicken is the main ingredient and the food contains a high dose of protein and other nutrients. The food even has fruits and vegetables for a more well- rounded nutrition- rich diet.This dog food has smaller kibbles and my 22 pound dog had no problem chewing them up. He has eaten other Nutro dog food products but like with other gourmet foods, he approached this food with caution. His interest was only lukewarm at first, but once he started to eat, he quickly finished his bowl. I was glad to see this, as I have had issues with certain other gourmet foods, some of which my dog would not eat at all unless I poured gravy or some other enticer on top of the food.Is there any drawback to Nutro Farms Harvest Small Breed Adult Chicken and Whole Brown Rice? I can think of only one, the obvious one, and that is the price. The small bag costs more than four dollars per pound, which is quite steep, even for a gourmet food. I recommend buying the larger bag so you can get a better per- unit cost. But even then, the price is high and some dog owners might not purchase the food for that reason alone.Good nutrition and superior ingredients are important to concerned dog owners everywhere. Nutro Farms Harvest Small Breed Adult Chicken and Whole Brown Rice is an excellent food for a dogs good health and as long as you can get past the high cost, you will find that this food fulfills most all of your demands in a quality dog food.

When was the last time you changed your shower curtain? We have two showers in our house, one with a glass door and the other with a curtain. It has been years since we changed the curtain, so when presented with this opportunity, I went ahead and grabbed it.With its pink colors, my girls- the primary users of the bathroom with the shower curtain- liked what they saw. I agree that the colors are pleasant and since my girls bathroom is neutral in color anyway, it was very easy to place this curtain and matching mat in the bathroom without anything looking weird.  The more feminine colors make it good choice for a girls bathroom so in this respect, the curtain/rug combo earns some points.However, this set from Oceanique loses points in other ways and one of them is with the shower hooks. They do not slide very well along the shower rod, due to their metal construction sliding against the metal rod. They seem cheap, too, and are not completely closed, rounded hooks. That makes it easy to remove the curtain and the hooks because they lift right off without little effort. But its bad because it means the hooks can pop off as you try to move the curtain back and forth. Rounded hooks take more effort to attach and remove, but they are more secure.Looking at the quality of the material used for the shower curtain and the mat, well, they seem okay but not anything great. When I think about the going price for this set, it does seem a little high for what you get and I notice that other reviewers have made similar observations. I do like that the mat stays in place on the floor and doesnt slide around but it seems a little too thin. And I also wish the set came with a liner. You have to supply this yourself, which seems unfair when you consider the price. The manufacturer should have included this.Shower curtains need occasional upgrades and the Oceanique shower curtain/bathroom mat set seems like an acceptable option. I know there are better curtains on the market and I still think the set is overpriced. But it does have enough going for it- including the fact that my girls like it- to make it worth a look.

A mattress topper can go very far in adding comfort to your sleep. Classic Brands Defend-A-Bed Mattress Topper is just the ticket I needed to more comfortable nighttime rest. Its special padding adds softness and its leak proof, to keep your mattress in top condition.Mattress toppers are essential for a better nights sleep but a flat, simple pad wont do the trick. These less expensive mattress pads might be cheaper, but they add nothing in the comfort area. Classic Brands does add a good deal of padding and you can feel the difference it makes, right out of the bag. The quilting fiber filling and bamboo cushions your mattress, making sleeping more comfy than before.This mattress topper can accommodate mattresses up to 22 inches in thickness, so it will work on most of the mattress out there. One thing to note- and that many others have stated- is that the sides of the padding are rather thin and seem a little flimsy. Nothing has happened to mine yet. It is still held firmly in place and the elastic edges havent come undone. But these sides do seem weak, like they may not last very long. The verdict is out on this, but considering the other positive qualities, Im going to predict that the sides hold up for the duration.With its waterproof feature and five year warranty, Classic Brands Defend-A-Bed Mattress Topper has two additional reasons to consider it for your bed. But the main reason to purchase this mattress pad is comfort, and it easily scores high marks in this area. In fact, I would say that it ranks as the best mattress pad/topper I have owned thus far and I cant wait to try out others in the Classic Brands lineup. Its an excellent mattress cover and all but guaranteed to improve your sleep.

Zumba Fitness Incredible Results is a fitness system ready to be employed in your living room. It comes complete with several workout disks and a Zumba Rizer, needed for some of the workouts.I usually limit my workouts to walking/jogging and for purposes of maintaining my size/weight, this seems sufficient. But sometimes, an outdoor walk around the neighborhood isnt practical due to rain, cold or hot temps, and other factors. This is where the Zumba Fitness system can help. It provides a ready- made cardio workout that increases your heart rate and produces the results you want from the comfort of home. Just view the images on your television screen, follow the moves, and watch as your personal fitness improves.The workouts presented in this Zumba routine are simple enough that most anyone can follow. The Zumba method involves alternating intense workouts with less intensity, back and forth, so that most anyone can take part and improve fitness. The different disks included in the set feature different routines, too, so you can select the one you like best to start. I find the Express routine is best because, with limited free time on my hands, it is the quickest one in the set. Most anyone can spare 20 minutes of time, so for someone like me, it fits in well with my schedule.Zumba Fitness Incredible Results is based on dance and those with a knack for dancing will enjoy it best and will take to it most quickly. However, dont worry if your dance moves arent smooth. Just try to follow along the best you can. You will still see and feel results regardless. Besides, no one is watching when youre in the privacy of your own living room, so bust out those moves and get in shape!Zumbas fitness routine is a useful one and Im glad I decided to give it a try. Aerobic fitness is something we all need more of every day and this exercise system will help you achieve the fitness goals you desire. Its a very good system overall and easily worth the investment.

Hills dog food is a recommended brand. Vets recommended it, as do many so- called experts on canine nutrition. Most every dog food that carries the Hill's name is above average in quality and Hill's Ideal Balance Crafted dog foods continue the trend.I try to feed my dog better food and, unless I'm in a bind and need dog food in a hurry, I refuse to purchase most grocery store brands. The reason is because of the ingredients. I just cant see serving my dog something with so little nutritional value and so many ingredients that are absolutely useless to a dog's body. Most of what is sold in stores just doesn't measure up, but this dog food easily makes the grade. Meat and vegetables are the main ingredients and there is no soy, wheat, or corn. This is exactly what I want and expect in a premium brand.As for the taste, my dog liked this dog food better than I expected. He has been known to shun these super- premium brands, but he liked this one very much. I was happy about this because, well, the price of this dog food is a little outrageous. The small size bag is priced very close to four dollars per pound, making it one of the costliest dog foods on the market. I agree that it's a very good dog food, but that price is difficult to swallow.If you can get past the sticker shock, you will find that Hill's Ideal Balance Crafted dog foods are worthy for your pet. The dry food doesn't smell bad and the nutrition is top notch. Try not to think about the excessive cash you are spending and focus instead on the great care you are showing your pet and you should be okay.

Melissa & Doug make many great toys and childrens crafts, many of which are made with higher quality materials yet still sold at a reasonable price. Melissa & Doug Press a Pendant Necklaces are yet another good craft from Melissa & Doug and one that will keep the young girl in your home happy until time for the next craft.Girls love to make jewelry and other girlie things and this item is definitely made with the girlie girl in mind. The included stickers help to personalize each necklace and girls will have fun assembling a necklace to their liking. There is enough material in the package to create 5 necklaces, making it perfect for your young one to try with her friends as part of a birthday party or gathering.This craft is recommended for kids age 8 to 12 and it does include small parts. Younger children will not be able to complete this on their own and will need help but children at least 8 years of age shouldnt have any trouble. My girls liked putting together a necklace to call their own and they enjoyed showing off their creative work. About the only issue is that a craft like this wont last very long. This is why I said earlier that it will keep the kiddos happy until time for the next craft- In a matter of minutes, your daughter and her friends will have a necklace assembled and ready to wear. There wont be anything left to do, so its not a good craft idea if you want something the kids can keep going back to, time and again.Melissa & Doug rarely fail to deliver the fun and the Press a Pendant Necklaces are another example of a good product from this toy manufacturer, Girls will love assembling their own necklace and once the five necklaces have been made, dont be surprised if your girls ask for another box. Its good, creative fun and most any elementary school age female child will like it.

Want a quick, easy to unpackage and eat treat that offers some decent nutritional value? Most snacks dont fit the bill, but one that does is Fiber One Streusel Bar Strawberry flavor.I like a quick snack and I like that these bars have more nutrition than others. They are made with real fruit, healthy whole grains, and a good dose of fiber. The added fiber is completely lacking in other snacks and does help set this snack food above others.As for the taste, well, these bars are decent although not quite the burst of natural flavor I was hoping for. The ingredients list concentrated strawberry puree and its nice that they use this real ingredient. But I wish there was more of this natural flavor and Im a little disappointed that the product contains artificial colors and other additives that contribute to the less-than-stellar flavor. The taste is, therefore, not much different than that of other strawberry flavored cereal bars and, while certainly not bad, it isnt as good as I had hoped.Still, when I compare the overall product to other, similar snack foods, I have to say that these are a notch better than most and the reason is the fiber and whole grains. Could these be made even better? Of course they could, but they easily measure up to or exceed other snack foods and they have enough good qualities to earn my recommendation.

A newer brand of dog food, Avoderm combines meat, veggies, and other ingredients for a formula that is healthy and balanced for dogs. This Avoderm variety, Small Breed Lamb, is formulated for smaller dogs and is loaded with natural ingredients and good nutrition.I have a smaller breed of dog that tends to like variety rather than routine. He likes most of the pricier, natural dog foods so this dog food seemed like a good option for him. I like that the formula is grain free and contains all sorts of extra ingredients you dont usually see in other dog foods. These ingredients have special benefits and based on the positive reviews I have read, Avoderm seems like a dog food on top of its game.Feeding this dog food to my pooch, I was happy to see him take to it so quickly. Sometimes, with natural dog foods, he takes time to warm up and there have even been instances where he wouldnt touch the food at all until I covered it with gravy. But he took to Avoderm right away and seemed very happy with his meal. I am ready to try some of the other Avoderm flavor varieties as a result. If my dog likes this one the way he does, then he is bound to like the rest.Avoderm is an American- made dog food and I like very much that the product comes with a satisfaction guarantee, no questions asked. This is great for those who are reluctant to purchase these high- end dog foods for fear that their dog wont take to the food and money will be wasted. But if your dog is anything like mine, he will thoroughly enjoy Avoderm Small Breed Lamb formula. Its made with healthy ingredients and is free from grain, for the best canine nutrition.

My girly girls love anything girly. They love to paint their nails and style their hair and that means they have a constant need for head bands and barrettes. Melissa and Dougs Mess Free Glitter Headbands and Barrettes Set was just what they needed for some creative and practical fun.I have always had a good deal of confidence in Melissa and Doug products and this one did not disappoint. My girls opened the box and started to have fun immediately, taking the 2 headbands and starting to decorate. They got to the barrettes later, but they loved everything and I liked that they were having fun while, at the same time, creating something they need and often use anyway.I like that this product doesnt contain messy, sprinkled glitter and I like that it offers some creative fun. The downside?- there isnt enough here to keep kids occupied for long. The assembly of a head band or barrette with added accessories and decorations is so simple, some kids will be done within minutes. This is very different from other crafts, some of which keep the young ones occupied for an hour or longer.Still, my girls do like this headband and barrette set from Melissa and Doug and they both give it two thumbs up. The cute designs include butterflies, flowers, and stars and most any girl will find the set fun, even if the fun is short- lived. It might be a good idea to purchase a second box if you have two girls like I do, but regardless, this is still a nice little toy and it comes with mine and my girls recommendation.

Nourish Shampoo and Conditioner for dogs is a great way to get your dog fresh and clean, Thick and with a pleasant scent, this dog shampoo is easy to apply and rinses clean with minimal effort.My dog is older and has problems with itching. He will often start by scratching his skin and then turn to biting at it in order to relieve the irritation. For this reason, we try to use special dog shampoos that are formulated to help control itching and related skin problems. This dog care product does claim to help with skin problems, so it seemed worthy of trying.And how did it work? Well, my dog lied down peacefully after a bath with this shampoo and I havent noticed much scratching at all. He slept soundly on a blanket and did not show many signs of skin irritation. Im saying he didnt scratch at all, because he did, but not as intensely as usual.This shampoo/conditioner succeeded in making my dogs coat feel soft and smooth, like a conditioning shampoo should. Its probably unnecessary to use this every time you give your dog a bath, as most dogs do not need excess amounts of conditioner. But the occasional use is a good idea and this product does condition well.An itchy dog is an unhappy dog and Nourish Shampoo seems to have taken care of my dogs problems, at least to an extent. I wasnt expecting miracles- I only wanted my dog to get a degree of relief and that is what he got with Nourish Shampoo and Conditioner. The product therefore worked as promised and is one I recommend.

Yoga is gaining in popularity and as it grows, the need for yoga- related merchandise also grows. Besides special clothing, one item that can help make any yoga workout better is a good set of towels and Athletec Sports has just the answer to this need with its Ultra Absorbent Yoga towel set.First, I must say that I do not do yoga but the four females in my house do and they were very interested in this set of towels for their weekly yoga workouts. The towels are blue in color with one larger size towel and one smaller size towel. They feature a non- skid backing that helps keep the towel in place on your workout mat. This feature alone makes a towel set like this one worth owning. Regular towels do not have any such feature and they slide around when placed on most surfaces. With this towel, you can feel at ease, knowing it will stay in place.This yoga towel set feels soft and I was very surprised when I learned the towels were made from polyester. Technology has certainly changed for the better, because I can recall a day when anything made with this much polyester felt anything but soft. Yes, an all- cotton towel is softer but the softness level is still good when all things are considered. These towels feel good and they are absorbent enough to relieve the perspiration that naturally comes with a yoga workout. The larger size towel in this set is almost six feet in length so its large enough to fit the entire body of most people. At first, we wished it was a little larger, but after using it a few times, it seems fine.About the only potential strike against this towel set is its use of Ultra Fresh technology, which includes some less desirable ingredients that have not been thoroughly tested. Other than that, this is a good yoga towel set and useful for any type of workout.

Young students of geography and travel love a good map and one that is worth considering as an addition to your childs bedroom wall is T.S. Shure Pictorial Map of the World. This map is laminated for durability with rivets in the corners for easy mounting and re- mounting plus stickers for added fun.With this map, kids get a general idea about the world around us and its many wonders. The countries are not depicted in their precise shapes but they are close enough that it shouldnt matter. On each continent and within each country, the map highlights some of the landmarks and points of interest. This is fun for kids who like to find places they have already visited and attractions already seen as well as find new and interesting places worth visiting in the future. With the added stickers, children can identify places they have been, first flight taken, first ride on a ship, places they want to visit, etc.This map is a good deal of fun for kids and I like anything that helps improve knowledge of geography, since this is an area where people are sorely lacking. But I must deduct one star from my rating due to some of the inaccuracies. Im not talking about the shapes of the countries I described above- this doesnt bother me too much because I realize it was intended more as a cartoon and not meant to be precise. But the placement of some countries and boundaries are inaccurate and not becoming of what should be an educational tool. One good example that I noticed right away is Cuba- the map shows Cuba as situated north of the Tropic of Cancer. It is, of course, south of the Tropic of Cancer and it should be shown this way on the map, but it isnt.So, the placement of certain things is a little off, but the rest of the map? I found it nice and my kids loved checking out the countries of the world and marking where they have already been and would like to visit. The map would be worthy of five stars were it not for the oversight described in the last paragraph, but it still has enough going for it to recommend.

In todays digital age, recording devices can be very useful. You never know when you might need to record a conversation, presentation, or the like and while many cell phones are made with built in recorders, there are special devices made for the job and one of them is this 8 GB voice recorder from iGearPro.As a blogger, having a small recording device is something very handy and this device is certainly small. Its dimensions measure only about three inches in length and about one and a half inches in width. Its small size is nice because it will fit in the most compact spaces. I can place it in my shirt pocket and it is entirely hidden from view. A recording device is a simple device and there is no need for a large size so making it small was the right thing to do.For recording, all you do with this device is press the button with the red dot, located on the front. The stop and play buttons are also right on the front with volume, mode, on/off, and other buttons on the side. I like that the manufacturer included labels for the side buttons. Just look at the back and you will see the labels. This is good because it clarifies what each button is for so you dont have to guess.I found the sound quality good with this device and I appreciate the included attachments and cables. But all is not perfect with this device, as it does contain a few notable flaws. One is the lag time when pressing the buttons. Once the stop button is pushed, it takes a few seconds of holding before it stops. Another issue I have is with the volume controls. They make a clicking sound when you push them and the clicking noises transfer through to your recording. I can easily tell when I hit the playback if someone pressed the volume button because you can hear the clicks.Still, I am satisfied overall with this device. It has plenty of space and that means you can transfer music and use the MP3 features without worry. The sound is clear and the included phone cable is perfect for those times when Im conducting an interview via telephone and want to make sure I capture every word. Its a good device for the money and one I recommend to all.

T.S. Shure Pictorial Map of the USA is a nice way to teach kids about the geography of the United States and some of the important landmarks and natural attractions common to different states. The map is in poster form for quick wall mounting with a laminated finish, making it easy to place and remove stickers.We spend a good deal of time traveling and with family living in other places, away from our home, we often talk about going places and seeing things, new and familiar. This colorful map is good for teaching kids where places are and the included stickers make it fun to mark where family live, where you would like to visit, and where you have been and would like to return. My girls liked placing the stickers on the poster and talking about attractions they would like to see in the future. The map helps give them a sense of where they are in relation to other places they know, helping them learn about distance, location, and more.This poster comes rolled up but thanks to the lamination and the grommets in the corners, it is easy to attach to a wall with no worries about tearing- a common concern with paper posters. The stickers number 62 in total and will keep kids occupied for some time. One of the few issues I have with the stickers, however, is that they do not contrast very well with the colorful and noisy background, and this means it takes more effort than it should to see them on the map. It would have been better if the stickers were colored/marked in such a way that they stand out on the surface of the poster. It would also be better if the states shapes reflected their actual shape. They are not depicted on the map in their actual shape, and this does bother the geographic purist in me.Still, all things considered, I like this poster for many reasons. The images make it fun and the colorful background and stickers make it appealing for kids. Considering the lack of geographic knowledge in todays society, anything that can give kids a leg up on others is welcome and T.S. Shure Pictorial Map of the USA does exactly that, teaching kids about American geography in a fun and educational way.

Bolse UBS Car Charger provides the power you need to keep your electronics going strong. With three ports, you can charge three separate electronics all at once, for the most efficient in- car charging possible.I use my smart phone and its camera for blogging and other purposes and a charged cell is a must for me. I can't arrive somewhere and discover I no longer have a charge on my phone. The phone has to be ready to go and this is why a good car charger is a must. This little device from Bolse is one of the most compact I have ever used and it gets the job done in a reasonable time. It's small enough to fit into your shirt pocket and when plugged into the cigarette lighter, you don't even know its there. From a physical standpoint, Bolse kept things simple and I'm glad they did.The best quality of this charger is the fact that it can charge three things at once. It doesn't come with its own cords or cord extensions, so you have to remember to bring those along in order to use the device. As long as you have the cords, this little charger is ready to help you. And there is no fighting with the wife and kids over who gets to charge their electronics first. There are three individual ports, so three items can charge at once.I use this charger for my smart phone and upon close examination, this charger is capable of charging my phone at the rate of about 9 percent every 10 minutes. This isn't lightning fast, but it's fast enough for my needs. I don't need 100 percent charge to pull out my cell phone, snap pictures, and share on social media. I only need to make sure my charge is at least in the 30 to 50 percent range and given the rate that this charger supplies the juice, I will almost certainly have the power I need by the time I arrive at my destination.This Bolse car charger might be made better with different size ports but for all I know, Bolse probably has a charger for that purpose. A little speedier charging would also help but this is still a very good charger for the price and it has proven itself very useful, supplying just the power I need when I need it most.

Mopping is an essential household chore and the right mop can make a noticeable difference in time and effort expended to get the job done. Ordinary sponge mops are fine for minor cleaning, but for the tougher stains, a better mop is a must and the Dirt Devil PD20100 2 I 1 Versa Steam Mop is a good tool for the task.This steam mop is lightweight and is easy to use. You just pour in the water and wait for it to heat up and produce steam. In less than a minute, the mop is ready to use. The steam action produces a good deal of heat, loosening up dirt and stains and making cleaning easy. The area where our dog lies on the floor is often the dirtiest in our house but this steam cleaner eliminates the messes with ease.Among the physical qualities I like best about this mop are the lightweight design and the triangular- shaped head. The mop is very light and versatile and its lightness almost makes it seem inadequate when you first use it. You start to doubt whether or not something this light can clean effectively, but your doubts fade away quickly once you plug it in and take it for a household spin. And the triangle shaped, swivel head is perfect for reaching corners- it glides into the far reaches of a room with ease. When you are finished, the scrubbing pad removes for simple machine washing.This Dirt Devil steamer can be used to clean carpets as well as tile and other surfaces and it comes with an attachment for cleaning items above the ground level. I have used it only on tile floors so I cannot comment on the effectiveness on carpet. But I like what I see with its ability to clean tile. The cleaning power of steam makes all the difference and since it fuels itself with water, there are no harsh chemicals. A few more attachments would be nice, but this is still a very good tool for the money and it does make cleaning the floor easier than before.

Koss SP540 Full Size Dynamic Headphones are a good set of headphones for most needs. Conforming to the shape of the ear for added comfort, these headphones deliver about as expected for the price.Comfort and sound quality are the two most important things I look for in a good set of headphones and this set earns a good grade on both counts. The D- shaped ear pieces fit the shape of your ears and feels good to wear. This is much better than the round- shaped ear pieces common with cheaper headphones. The sound is good, too, and it got better with repeated use. The bass in particular is very good with these headphones. My kids actually appreciate the sound more than me, as evidenced by their quickly snatching them from my desk and using them on their ipads and kindles.As I said, for the price, these headphones are good and they reproduce sound quite well. I like that they can be turned to store them flat and they have an attractive appearance. The one issue I have with these headphones is the vinyl pads on the ear pieces. One of them popped off and I had a heck of a time getting it reattached. They do not snap back into place- you have to take the thin edge of the vinyl and push it back in place, in a small crease. There isnt much give, so you have to stretch it and you need to hold one side while you attach the other- similar to the process of attaching bike tire to a rim. I almost gave up at first, but I kept trying until I got it back into place.Koss does make some very good quality headphones and this set, while not excellent, is still very good and worthy of your money. Just try to be careful and avoid letting the padding come loose on the ear pieces and you should be fine.

Do your kids like to color? Mine love to and they will often preoccupy themselves for hours with nothing more than a simple canvas and a set of paints, crayons, or markers. With Alex Toys Color a House Childrens Kit, they have precisely that- a large canvas and six colored markers for hours of safe, enjoyable fun.My girls have had multiple houses like this one and they love the coloring part more than anything. Yes, once the house is assembled it does serve as a place of play but its really the coloring part that they like best. This particular house is about as good or better than others, with similar construction and only a few minor flaws.On the positive front, the kids love the cute design. The sides of the house feature flowers, lights, bugs, and other things, all depicted in a cutesy way. My girls love coloring with the markers and adding their own expressive twists and turns. I like that the toy comes complete with six large markers that include all of the primary and secondary colors- Red, blue, yellow, purple, orange, and green. The markers are big and contain enough ink to last for the duration and beyond. The colors are bright and attractive, too, and they add greatly to the enjoyment of the toy. Having to supply our own markers would have been a royal pain, but Alex Toys includes them so you dont have to worry.The one issue we had with this toy is assembly. It should be easy to put together, but we did have some challenges with the roof and the dormer window on the top. It would be nicer if the house was a little larger, too. But other than these issues, this is a nice toy that encourages creativity and keeps the kids busy and out of trouble for a long time.

I'm not very picky when it comes to shampoo. My hair is short, is thinner than it once was, and doesn't need the level of care that others' hair requires. With the exception of the shampoos that have a drying effect on the hair and scalp, most others will work okay for me.Still, even though my needs are minimal, I try to change out my shampoos and use different varieties for the benefits they offer. Jack Black True Volume Thickening Shampoo has turned out to be a good choice for my hair. It's masculine scent, moderate thickness, and ability to add a small amount of shine and body to my hair make it just as good if not better than others.This shampoo doesn't have any conditioners, so it shouldn't be used if that is what you need. Rather, it's an everyday shampoo, good for all hair types and it contains specific ingredients to help make the hair and scalp healthier and make hair a little thicker. I haven't noticed much difference in the area of thickening, but then again, I don't have a lot of hair remaining to thicken, so I cannot validate this claim. But I like the way my hair feels after using this shampoo and it seems to do the trick without any drying or other negative effects.I will continue to use a variety of shampoos and Jack Black True Volume Shampoo is a product I will purchase again. I haven't noticed it at local stores, but I know it's available online and its ability to clean and protect the hair and scalp are more than sufficient to make it worthy of a try.

A microscope is a great learning tool and many among us have fond memories of using one in science class in junior high or high school. Pre- elementary school age children are often too young for a real microscope, but there is no reason not to get them started young, and that is where the Manhattan Toy Learning Play Microscope can help.What do you get with this play microscope? Well, you get a very sturdy toy with three lenses, three petri dishes, and three lenses for viewing fun. The make- believe petri dishes are fun because kids can look at patterns, bugs, and more, all of which change depending on the lens being used.The best feature of this toy microscope is its construction. It isnt made from cheap plastic or other material likely to break or wear out. Its actually made from wood and it is designed to last. The second best feature of the microscope is its educational value. Yes, its only make believe but it does stimulate imaginative play and it does get kids thinking more about science.Kids are exposed to science in grade school but there is no reason to wait until that time to open the mind of a child to this wondrous field of study. The Manhattan Toy Learning Play Microscope does the trick and while I would like it better if it had a few more accessories, it still has enough going for it- not to mention the sturdy wooden construction- to recommend it for the toddler in your home.

Disney has a huge amount of appeal to my two girls. They have loved Disney from the beginning and are still attracted to anything bearing the Disney name and images. This is why they took so quickly to the Disney Princess Ariel Hooded Bath/Beach Poncho Towel, It features Ariel, one of their all- time favorite Disney characters, and has cute colors that kids will love.This towel/poncho is designed to be worn over the head for use after a bath or after exiting a pool and it seems okay for these purposes. It is a little smaller than I expected, but younger elementary school- age children should be able to use it, even if it doesnt cover as much as they or their parents would prefer. So, for older kids, most of their legs will still be exposed, but most will love the towel/poncho so much, they will use it anyway.Probably my greatest issue with the Disney Princess Ariel Hooded Bath/Beach Poncho Towel is that it isnt very absorbent. Im used to the big, thick, fluffy towels we have in our household. They absorb lots of water and this Disney Poncho/Towel cannot compare. Still, it probably wont matter to Ariel fans, many of whom will fall in love with the towel immediately and wont care about or even notice its small flaws.My girls will likely be Disney fanatics for life and the Disney Princess Ariel Hooded Bath/Beach Poncho Towel is a towel they like and continue to use. It isnt perfect, but the girls love it and use it without complaint, making it a good choice for the little mermaid in your home.

My girls love anything Disney and they have been a fan of the Disney Princesses since the first time they opened their eyes. They love having a cute towel to use after bath or pool time and the Disney Princess Aurora Hooded Bath/Beach Poncho Towel is exactly that- a cute, colorful towel that can be worn over the head, featuring a Disney Princess.I knew there was no doubt my girls would like this towel at least in concept and I was proven right immediately. They loved the towel the moment they opened the package and couldnt wait to give it a try. They didnt want to wait to use the pool, so they decided to give the towel a try at bath time. I figured if it could encourage them to take a bath, then the towel would be worthwhile.After using this towel, their opinions are still intact, but mine a little less so. First, the towel is smaller than I expected. It seems like it was intended for younger girls, but ones a little older like my youngest, who is age 7, can still get away with using it. The towel wont cover much of their body, but it will be sufficient for most grade school age kids 8 and under provided they are not too big. Of course, I cant really hold this against the manufacturer. It was really my fault for not checking the size first, but it is something to keep in mind.As for the quality, it is very soft, 100 percent cotton and it seems made to last. It isnt as absorbent as other towels, however, so I found that I needed to have a regular towel ready to hand my young ones to soak up the excess water. The more I think about it, this towel might actually be better suited as a quick cover- up for use at the pool. The need for quick absorbency isnt as important when exiting the pool so I might relegate this towel/poncho to that use.My little ones love the Disney Princesses and other Disney characters and they do like these towels. I would like them better if they soaked up water a little more efficiently, but the kids love them regardless and if it encourages them to take a bath, then they are easily worth the cost.

My girls like to help out in the kitchen. They like to create different foods and are fascinated at how everything is put together to create an amazing meal. They like kiddie- related food prep too so I got hold of the Cool Baker Magic Mixer Maker and introduced it to them one afternoon.Right out of the box, they seemed to love this little contraption. They liked that it is colored pink and they like that it looks just like an actual kitchen appliance. They got it ready, mixed up some cakes, and about 20 minutes later, served a bite to themselves and to me. They seemed to like the taste. I found it rather dull and unmemorable, but I had to remind myself that the mixer and the food it creates are made with kids in mind so if they like it, then that is what matters.As for the durability, it seems rather cheap and not likely to last. It was simple enough to use and my girls liked turning the crank and mixing up the batter. It did make somewhat of a mess, but not something that couldnt be cleaned up quickly. And I like that the cake didnt require baking. Just 15 to 20 minutes in the refrigerator was all it took to make the cake ready for sampling.Once the cake mixes were used, I was concerned that my kids would toss this aside, but they still use it from time to time as a regular toy. I almost prefer they didnt because I feel excess use is going to make it fall apart faster. But its nice to know that they still like using it without the cake.My kids like to make foods and they seem to like the Cool Baker Magic Mixer Maker. It does have a few issues as I describe above. But it has enough going for it to recommend it for the young chef in your home.

SmartLab Toys Its Alive Slime Lab is just one of dozens and dozens of slime toys intended to fascinate the young scientist in your home. The way most of these labs works is similar: Combine the included slime mix, if any exists, with a few household items like baking soda, vinegar, cornstarch, etc., and let the fun begin.This slime toy works like the others in terms of the mixing, but it is also different than others, and I mean that in a good way. With this slime lab, the mixture is placed atop a motor that vibrates for greater effect. Kids can watch the colors and textures swirl around as the vibrations create some fun and very visual patterns. The instructions include 20 different recipes for slime and each can be made using items found in most kitchens.What I probably like best about this slime lab is the lack of mess! Okay, there is some mess but in relative terms, the messiness is kept under control very well. The key difference is that, with most other slime labs my kids have used, messiness is encouraged. These other labs involve sticking hands in the slime, spreading it with your hands, and so on. This is messy and gross, and if multiple kids are involved, they often end up smearing it on each other, splattering it on the floors and more. There is no problem like that with SmartLab. The slime, for the most part, stays in the bowl, out of your way.Educational toys are nice and SmartLab Toys Its Alive Slime Lab is a toy that does get kids thinking and asking questions. My girls like it and have returned to it more than once, creating more slime and learning about household chemicals and how they react. Its a good choice of toy that will keep kids entertained as they learn.

George Foreman GR136B Classic Plate Grill is a small appliance good for cooking up a pair of burgers, chicken breasts, or other grilled item in a short span of time. The grill heats up quickly and cooks both sides of a food item thoroughly with little fuss.I have owned and used other George Foreman grills so I was already familiar with the concept when I obtained this one. The way it works is basically the same. You place the meat on the grill, close the lid, and let it go to work. Grease drips out of the front of the grill where it is caught in a pan, keeping more of the bad stuff away from your food and out of your body. This model works like the others, only on a smaller scale. And that could be an issue for some customers. There is very little space on this grill, making it useful for only one person or a couple that doesnt eat much. Its actually even smaller than I expected, so if you need space and want to grill enough meat to feed a large family, you dont want to buy this.However, if a small amount of grilling is all you need, then this George Foreman grill could suit you well. It heats up very quickly and cooks a pair of burgers in minutes without excess smoke or mess. There is only one setting- high- so you need to be careful and not leave it unattended. Most of the grease will fall and drip out the front, where it collects in the included tray. I found that cleanup of the grill was easy, too, but only if you take care of it right away. Allow it to sit for long and it will be more difficult to get clean. And you need to be careful how you clean because you should always avoid scratching the interior coating, which could make it no longer usable.For larger meal preparation, a larger George Foreman grill is a must. But for those who want to prep a quick meal for one or two, this George Foreman Grill should suit you well.

Everyone could use a backup power source these days. With cell phones, iPads, and other electron devices so commonplace and so increasingly likely to run out of juice when out and about, a supplemental power source is often needed and that is what you get with the NOCO Xgrid Portable Solar Panel and USB kit.I use my android smartphone on a regular basis and I have had situations where I was outdoors at festivals and other events and my phone started to run low. I needed to take pictures and share on social media for my blog but had to limit my phone usage due to low power. I could have really used something that would supply the extra jolt of power I needed without an outlet, and NOCO Xgrid Portable Solar Panel is just that device. You open up the flaps, place it in direct sunlight, and get the power you need instantly.In concept, this device is a great idea and I have had a good deal of success with it. However, it does have a few shortcomings that most will quickly discover when they use this for the first time. For one, the panels work best if placed in direct sunlight and the stronger the light, the better. I tried placing it behind glass, on the dashboard of my car, but it  charged slowly. Partial sun will work, but strong, direct sunlight is best so if you live in a place with limited sunlight, this device may not work very well for you. Another issue I have had is with the detachable battery pack. It takes quite some time to charge it completely and it doesn't work well if only partially charged. The first time I used it, it had been plugged into the solar panels and placed in direct sun for about an hour. I plugged it into my phone but it wouldn't work at all.
