I mostly shoot large format (4x5 and 8x10) but there are some circumstances where I love to shoot with either my Mamiya 7 or my Canon. In particular, I love shooting natural, low light level scenes of people. I refuse to use a flash as it absolutely kills the look I am going for. So lenses like the 50mm 1.0 and the 85mm 1.2 are an absolute godsend for this kind of shooting. These lenses let in so much light that they basically create a style of photography unique unto themselves as you simply cant do some of the things you can do with these lenses with other lenses. Did I say that correctly? Once you master these lenses and what they are capable of, it will blow you away what you can do with just a little bit of light. Add to this the development side of the zone system and its truly remarkable what these lenses are capable of producing.I have always been drawn to the unique qualities that lie within certain aspects of photography. I think its one of the main reasons why I shoot with the camera's I shoot with and why I am still, for the most part, shooting with film. For example, one of the main reasons why I love large format so much, beyond the amazing image quality, is because you can do so many unique things with perspective, focus, and depth of field simply by playing with the alignment of the standards. Well, the 50mm 1.0, and the 85mm 1.2 are the standards in my 35mm photography work. If it weren't for these lenses, I honestly dont think I would still be shooting with 35mm. The lenses themselves are truly works of art and can significantly extend your abilities in regards to shooting in low light level situations. Of course the quality of the glass itself is top notch. Then again, if your interested in this lens then you are probably already aware of the quality of these lenses (razor sharp, amazing color rendition, etc.).Bottom line - The 85mm F1.2L II is an absolutely brilliant lens. As I stated in the title of this review, I consider it 2nd only to the 50mm 1.0L. If your looking for a portrait/people lens that is capable of shooting in low light level situations then this is the lens for you. I couldn't imagine my kit without it.5 Stars!

Ill make this short and sweet, this makes a great gag gift. I recently brought a few packages as a stocking stuffer for my nephew, who just entered 10th grade. As he was opening it, I told him that I asked a bunch of his friends what they thought he might want for Christmas and I told him that almost all of them recommended this. Of course I didn't really ask his friends, it was just a set up for him opening it and I made it seem as serious as possible. Its important to note that he opened it in front of my entire family, roughly 30 people strong, and nobody but me knew what it really was. To say that laughter erupted in the room would be a massive understatement. Nobody, not a single person in the room, had ever heard of this soup and everyone found it absolutely hilarious that this was really not a joke gift, that its an actual soup. I dont care who you are, if you can say Spicy Cock Soup without having even the slightest urge to laugh....well, lets just say that the vast majority of people out there that actually have a sense of humor will find it hysterical, especially if its the first time they have ever seen it.The thing with my nephew actually went down a few years ago and family members still bring it up from time to time. If you could have only seen the look on my nephews face, lol. Anyways, if your looking for a great gag gift then look no further. This is one of the best gag gifts I have ever come across. What makes it so great is the fact that its not a gag gift. This is a real product and this is the real name. As for the soup itself, I have no clue. Have never tried it and I dont think I ever will. Ill stick with Ms Grass5 Stars!!

Bissell's Little Green carpet machine is a must have item in our house. We recently had a cat get sick and we dealt with throw up on a pretty much daily basis for 4+ months, sometimes 2-3 times a day. During that time we experimented with a lot of different soap products for the Green Machine and this 2X Advanced Formula was easily the best one that we tried, especially in regards to how your carpet smells after cleaning. This formula smells really nice and it works great on stains. Overall this is a great formula and a significant improvement over the non concentrate Bissell formula that we used to use.We tried using a more dilute mixture with this, as one of the reviews on here suggests, and we simply didn't get the same results. Don't get me wrong, it wasn't a huge difference but there was a noticeable difference. We tried multiple weaker dilutions side by side with the recommended dilution and there was a very clear difference. We dont have a problem with the soap attracting dirt as we always do a 100% water rinse after using soap. This was a tip passed down from our professional carpet guy that we bring in a couple times a year to clean our carpet. We have been using him for over 15 years and the man knows almost everything there is to know about carpets. He basically told us that if we were going to use bissell machines that we had to make sure to get all of the soap out of the carpet. This is an issue with the home carpet machines as they dont have anywhere near the suction that the professional machines have. The best way to make sure your getting the soap out is to do a 100% water rinse after using the soap. In fact, he recommended going over it twice with water. If you dont get all the soap up then yes, it will eventually dry and become sticky and this will attract dirt and make your carpet get dirty faster. On top of that, the soap itself can actually damage the carpet fibers when left on for long periods.I personally recommend using this soap at the recommended dilution, especially if your dealing with a noticeably dirty carpet or a stain. Just make sure you go back over it one or two times with just water to make use your getting all of the soap up. That's how we do it and we have had nothing but great results. Then again, I would recommend doing the water rinse even if you did decide to dilute this formula a bit more.Bottom line - We consider our Bissell an absolute godsend and have no doubt whatsoever that our carpet would have been toast a LONG time ago if it weren't for our Bissell. With that being said, this 2x Advanced Formula is the best cleaning formula we have tried yet. Together with a Bissell...well, they create a one two punch that very few stains can stand up too. If you have kids or animals, a Bissell and a bottle of 2x Advanced Cleaning Formula should be considered absolutely mandatory!

I have been drinking green tea for roughly 10 years now and I love everything about it, except the fact that its more difficult to steep due to the required temperature of the water. The method I have used was basically boiling the water and then either waiting for it to come down to the right temperature or adding small amounts of cool water to bring the temperature down. I wouldn't necessarily call it a pain but I certainly wouldn't call it convenient either. I also drink Black tea from time to time and its just so nice to be able to make a cup of tea without fixating on the water temperature. I wish green tea was as easy to steep as black tea.Well, I finally decided to give an electric kettle a try and boy am I glad I did. It has basically taken the whole process of heating the water and turned it into a non issue, something I dont even have to think about anymore. I have a very high quality digital thermometer in my darkroom and I figured I would test how accurate the temperature settings were. The Green Tea setting, really the only one I was concerned with, was incredibly accurate. I tested it 4 different times and each time I got very accurate results. Basically I got results that were always within a single degree from the desired temperature or in other words the green tea setting gave me water that was basically 180 degree's (+/- 1 degree). To be perfectly honest, I wasn't expecting it to be this accurate. Its important to note that the water I use for my tea, and the temperature test, is double filtered, first through a reverse osmosis filter and then through a Brita pitcher.I will admit that I would have preferred that this unit was 100% stainless steel. The plastic lid and plastic temperature knob bring the quality down a small notch. I would have actually paid more for a 100% stainless unit. I am just not a big fan of adding plastic components to an item like this. With that being said, this unit is very close to perfect and ultimately it makes the process of making green tea, or any drink that requires heated water, a very simple process. An electric kettle is now a must have item in my house.5 Stars!

I will be the first to admit that cooking with quality cookware and utensils can make all the difference in the world in regards to how enjoyable cooking can be. For example, there is just something about using a great set of knives or cooking on a great set of pans. IMO, this extends to everything you use in the kitchen. With that being said, we had the cheapest set of measuring cups and I have, for the longest time, wanted to buy a nice set so I finally pulled the trigger and ordered this set. That was roughly 9 months ago and I can now safely say that these measuring cups are top notch in every way. First and foremost the quality is amazing. They are made from high quality 18/10 stainless steel (18% chromium and 10% nickel). Make no mistake about it, you take proper care of these and these will be the last measuring cups you ever need to buy. There are 7 measuring cups in total: 1/8 Cup, 1/4 Cup, 1/3 Cup, 1/2 Cup, 2/3 Cup, 3/4 Cup, and 1 Cup. They stack perfectly together which means the entire set takes up very little space overall.One of my favorite aspects to these measuring cups are the really long handles. You can scoop really far down into bags and containers and it just makes them easier to handle. Because of the long handles, a few of the smaller cups are unstable when empty. In other words, the long handles makes them tip to the side of the handle. They cant rest flat when empty. This is a total non issue for me as I never use the smaller measuring cups in a way that would cause this to be a problem. Thankfully they didn't give the cups that do this smaller handles as I love how the entire set comes together for storage. Having a few cups with shorter handles would have really taken away from this aspect of the set.Bottom line - These are the best measuring cups I have ever used. Again, if properly taken care of this will be the last set of measuring cups you ever need to buy. Most importantly their just a real pleasure to use in the kitchen. A top notch set of measuring cups in every regard!5 Stars!

"All the world's a stage, And all the men and women merely players...." This is the phrase that begins a monologue from William Shakespeare's "As You Like It". Its one of my all time favorite quotes. With that being said, changing the opening monologue around a bit can really describe, in perfect terms, the current state of the world."All the world's a stage, And all the men and women merely puppets...."It really does perfectly describe the current state of our planet and if your here reading this...well, odds are you either know or suspect that the so called puppet masters are the members of the Bilderberg group. What I personally find so crazy is the fact that the whole "Bilderberg Group" topic in general is still widely considered to be a "conspiracy theory". Its important to note that the term "conspiracy theory" has purposely been twisted in recent years to have a completely different meaning than it used to have. The original meaning of the term was basically "a theory that explains an event or set of circumstances as the result of a secret plot by usually powerful conspirators". The new meaning of the term still has ties to the original, the difference now is that the term has an immediate association with "crazy people" or people on the fringe of society. Basically, the word conspiracy is now immediately associated with the word crazy. This new association was intentionally and methodically done by the people that control the media and to say they have been wildly successful in this regard would be a massive understatement. If you were to play a word association game and ask people to name the first thing that comes to mind when you say a particular word, I am betting over half of the people asked would associate conspiracy theory with crazy. Again, this was intentional as it basically discredits anything you slap that label on.Anyways, getting back on topic, I just dont understand how the "Bilderberg Group" can still be considered a conspiracy theory as a lot of things are known to be absolute fact. For example, we know for a fact that the Bilderberg Group is made of the worlds most powerful and wealthy people. We know for a fact that these people meet in secret every year. We know for a fact that no press is allowed and the entire thing is shrouded in secrecy. I just dont get it. What do people think these people are doing? If they have nothing to hide, why not let the press attend? I dont care what anyone says, nothing good can come from the worlds most powerful, wealthy, and corrupt people meeting in secrecy every year. Those who do believe such a thing have been brainwashed into complacency.As for the book, Daniel Estulin probably has more knowledge on this topic than anyone else in the world, short of the Bilderbergers themselves. He is one of a small handful of people that have exposed The Bilderberg Group. Risking both life and limb, these people have pulled the curtain back and exposed this group for what it really is. If you have any interest in this subject then this is easily the one book that you must read. In all honesty, this book should be required reading for everyone as the only power we have against these people is our numbers and unfortunately the number of people that know the truth are VASTLY outnumbered by those still in the dark. Hopefully books like this will change that fact in the coming years. Until then the only advice I can give is to educate those around you and getting people to read this book would be the best way to do that.Bottom line - Make no mistake about it, The Bilderberg Group is real and these people are not meeting in secret every year to discuss their favorite colors. "Power corrupts; absolute power corrupts absolutely". This is also one of my favorite quotes and ultimately I dont think I have ever heard a quote that had more truth to it than this quote does. Power does corrupt. In fact, everywhere you look you can find an absolute boatload of evidence to back this up. The Bilderberg group is all about absolute power, control and ultimately corruption. If these people are ever going to be stopped then people must first wake up to whats really going on. Reading this book and getting others to read this book is the best way to go about doing that.The curtain has been pulled back. Its time that people learn whats back there.5 Stars!

We have had an Xbox 360 in our home since the system first came out and I can easily say that the last 6 years with this console has been the best 6 years I have had yet with a videogame system and that is saying something as I have had just about every console released since Pong was released back in the mid 70's. Microsoft, a company that I was never too fond of given the fact that I am an Apple computer user, has really done an outstanding job with this system. While there were some hardware issues with the earlier consoles, I can safely say that the Xbox 360 S is a top notch console with none of the problems that plagued earlier models. Its superior in almost every way to previous models.My single favorite aspect to this system is without a doubt Xbox Live and all of the things that come along with the service (you get 3 months included with this holiday pack). Basically Xbox Live gives you the ability to play games online and lets you download arcade games, game demos, trailers, TV shows, music and movies. Out of all of the things that MS has done, putting so much focus on the development of Xbox Live is, in my opinion, the smartest thing they have done yet in regards to this console. Xbox live has really become a fantastic part of the Xbox gaming experience. In fact, I couldn't imagine Xbox without Xbox Live. In particular, both my son and I love Xbox Live Arcade. There is now a massive assortment of games on Xbox Live Arcade and the nice thing about the games, besides the lower cost, is that they dont require the time investment that most of the regular Xbox games require. Its a more casual gaming experience and I really appreciate that, especially during my busy season with photography as I simply dont have the time to invest in big games during that time of the year. I love that every game available on Xbox Live Arcade has a demo available so you can actually try it out before making up your mind on whether or not to buy it. Xbox Live also has an on demand game section, which are regular disc based releases that you can buy and download over Xbox live. I personally dont buy on demand games as the prices really aren't competitive and I just cant justify buying a download version of a game when I can actually buy the physical version for the same price or less. Of course, buying the physical copy gives you the ability to sell it later on. This isn't possible with downloaded versions. Given that aspect alone, on demand games should be at least 5-10 bucks cheaper than the physical version and unfortunately that just hasn't been the case and this is one area where Xbox live can be significantly improved.Xbox live also offers additional services like Netflix, Hulu Plus, ESPN, Zune, and LastFM. We currently use Netflix and ESPN and we love both services. Its important to note that Microsoft recently announced that 40 additional entertainment partners will soon be joining the Xbox Live experience including Comcast, HBO GO, Syfy, Verizon FiOS, Bravo, and Xfinity. This really isn't surprising given the fact that Microsoft has stated many times that their vision for the future of Xbox lies in it becoming a hub for entertainment in your home, not just a videogame console. With the announcement of 40 additional entertainment services being added, MS are now one step closer to making this a reality and I expect the list of services will only continue to grow over the coming years. Basically this gives people the ability to individualize their TV experience through Xbox live. I only watch about 5% of the channels I receive through cable, and pay a hefty price to be able to do so. So I am very interested in where this console is going in this regards.I also really like that MS has been focusing more and more on the family side of gaming as my wife enjoys gaming and we have an 11 year old son. In particular, we really enjoy Family Game Night which highlights a different family game every Tuesday. The number of games suitable for younger children has increased substantially over the last few years and the console itself has parental options that allow you to lock out certain content from your children. This includes games, movies and TV shows. I travel a lot so these options are very important to me. I dont have to worry about what content my son is accessing while I am away.As for regular gaming, Xbox certainly doesn't disappoint. There are so many great games available that I literally dont have time to play all of them. Just look at the games released, or being released, in the last quarter of 2011. You have Gears of War 3, Forza 4, Battlefield 3, The Lord of the Rings: War in the North, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3, Metal Gear Solid HD Collection, Elder Scrolls: Skyrim, Assassin's Creed: Revelations, Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, Saints Row 3, Batman Arkham City, etc. Those are just the high profile games. Of course, Xbox has a huge catalog of titles already available and many of those games can be purchased for 20 dollars or less. You can even play a large number of original Xbox titles on the 360, many of which are amazing games and could easily be found for 10 bucks or less at used game stores. Most people have a limited amount of time that the can devote to playing games and given the sheer number of great games available....well, lets just say that the vast majority of people will have the same problem I have, that you dont have time to play all the games you want to play.For those that are looking to get their first console, this holiday bundle is a great deal. It has the 250 Gig HD and comes with 2 of the biggest games released this past year, Halo Reach and Fable 3. Its important to note that the you dont get the physical copy of Halo Reach. You get a code that gives you the ability to download it from Xbox Live On Demand.Bottom line - Microsoft has really done a remarkable job with their Xbox gaming system. They have had a few bumps along the way but overall the Xbox is a top notch gaming system that now offers far more than just gaming. Whether your looking for casual gaming, hardcore gaming, online gaming, family gaming, or even motion based gaming, the Xbox has more than enough to fit the bill. As I stated originally, the last 6 years with the Xbox 360 has without a doubt been the best 6 years I have ever had with a console. Xbox 360 has become a staple in my house in regards to my families entertainment. Whether its for gaming, movies or TV shows, the Xbox doesn't disappoint. I really couldn't possibly give this console a higher recommendation. Its just a top notch entertainment device.5 Stars!!

These pants are hands down my favorite outdoor pants on the market. Every single aspect of these pants has been carefully designed and ultimately what you get is the best full featured outdoor pants on the market.First and foremost these pants are about as comfortable as pants can get. The cut, which includes a  full-length inseam gusset and articulated knees, is outstanding and the weight of the fabric is just right, not too thin and not to thick. The waistline is lined with an extremely soft micro-chamois that feels great against your skin, even after long hikes carrying a 60 pound backpack. I have to give props to Mountain Hardware for going with an 11" inseam for the shorts. Too many convertible pants have shorts that are way too short. 10" would be fine too but anything shorter than that and....well, no thanks. Most of the other convertible pants I have tried had 8 & 9" inseams. Changing back and forth between shorts and pants couldn't be easier, which isn't the case with many convertible pants. The zippers work flawlessly and it only takes a few seconds to get them off or to put them back on. The pockets are actually one of my favorite aspects of these pants as there are a lot of them and they are big enough to hold a lot of gear.Some other important details include having a DWR finish, a UPF 50 sun protection rating, reinforced knees and seat, an integrated belt, and an adjustable drawcord in the leg hem. Overall these pants have everything that one looks for in a great pair of outdoor pants. In particular, the DWR finish is outstanding. On a recent trip to Rocky Mountain National Park, we got pummeled with 7 straight days of constant light misty rain and my legs never got wet. The pants continued to throw off whatever water mother nature threw at them. Some lower quality DWR finishes can become saturated over time and actually start to take in a bit of water. You dont have to worry about that with your Matterhorn's. Some of my Matterhorn pants are over 3 years old and the DWR coatings are still going strong.The only downside to these pants is they can get a bit uncomfortable in really hot weather. If your planning on going somewhere really hot then I would recommend using Mountain Hardware's Mesa convertible pant instead of the Matterhorn. The Mesa has lighter fabric thus more comfortable in really hot weather. In all honesty, I bring both my Matterhorn's and my Mesa's anytime I travel. Its a 1-2 combination that simply cant be beat by other companies.Bottom line - I have been wearing these pants for over 3 years and I really have yet to find their equal. I have worn them in just about every environment that one can find in the US plus some demanding environments outside of the US and they have performed flawlessly each and every time. If your looking for a high quality pair of outdoor pants then look no further. They are a bit more expensive than your average pair of outdoor pants but this is a case where you get what you pay for and its absolutely worth the extra cash.5 Stars!

I stopped by a buddies house last night to pick up a receiver I had lent him and he was playing Goldeneye when I walked in. He asked me if I wanted to give it a try and to make a long story short, I wound up leaving his place roughly 3 hours later, with the game in tow. He had to work super early so he lent me the game until he gets off of work tonight. I popped it in as soon as I got home and didn't put it down until I passed out at roughly 5AM.First and foremost this game wasn't even on my radar. In fact, I am being 100% honest when I say that I didn't even know it was coming out until I saw it in my buddies console. I visit Amazon's videogame sections, among many other videogame sites, all the time and I dont remember ever seeing anything about it. I also subscribe to a bunch of videogame magazines and I cant remember ever seeing it in any of those either. This game was completely invisible to me, until last night. To say I was impressed is a massive understatement. This is easily the best James Bond game I have played in a long time and it ultimately makes the recent James Bond games like Quantum of Solace and Bloodstone look even worse than they normally do. This is what a James Bond game is supposed to be like.My favorite aspect of this game is that you can play the missions as you like and the controls are absolutely spot on. In fact, these are the tightest controls I can ever remember in a James Bond game. They really are spot on. I love games that reward a stealthy, patient approach yet allow you to run in guns blazing if you so desire. Goldeneye Reloaded is perfect example of such a game. I am roughly 7 hours in and the variety in missions has been outstanding. The developers mix things up extremely well so you never feel like the game is starting to grind or starting to get boring. Even the vehicular missions are done really well. Most importantly, this just feels like a James Bond game through and through, something that was lacking entirely in recent Bond games. Again, this is what a James Bond game should be like.I have seen a lot of negative comments written in regards to this games price, which is really one of the main reasons why I chose to write this review. For the most part, I agree with the criticism as it would have been nice to see this game have a 40 dollar price point, which is really in line with what we have seen from other HD upgrades. With that being said, from a game play perspective...well, this game is absolutely worth the 60.00 especially if your a big fan of James Bond or stealth/shooter styled games. If you have a problem with the price, simply wait a few weeks for the price to come down. I plan on buying a copy myself and I am not planning on waiting like I do with most games. My son is a huge James Bond fan and he will absolutely love this game. I already do.5 Stars!

These adapters are very useful and work well. There really isn't much to them, but that's a good thing. They are very small, compact, and just work as they should. I like the slim straight profile since it keeps the USB devices in line for the maximum compatibility. USB-C ports are the new wave of future devices. They are currently found on new devices such as a new Macbook or the new Chromebook. As useful as USB-C is, I have so many standard USB devices that are still heavily used. These small adapters allow me to continue using them! Good quality. I received these adapters at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

I'm sensitive to nickel so I was very curious how these "no metal type" pieces would look and feel. True to the description, I did not experience any irritation while wearing these for the day. My ears are most sensitive to nickel and these were great. Each piece is beautiful and looks much more expensive than they're worth. The shine on this set is very nice and I hope they maintain the look after time. The clasps are easy to use and are strong. Overall I'm very impressed with this set. I received this set for free in exchange for an honest review.

This is a great little aromatherapy diffuser. It takes up very little space and works well.Pros:+Compact+Attractive (from a distance)+Multiple LED lighting options to suit your mood+Built-in timer with various settings+Works well for a small room+Detachable power cordCons:-Short power cordThis is like a mini ultrasonic humidifier, that allows you to add your own essential oils for aromatherapy. It holds 350ml (which is a lot for this product category) and is easy to refill. You simply lift the globe off the base, remove the power cord, and slightly twist the globe apart (press fit, not screwed) and you can dump or refill as needed. It's so small it can be placed anywhere in any room so long as you have an AC outlet nearby. I really wish it were powered by micro USB like so many devices these days. That would make it easy to move around and source longer cables. In any case, this little diffuser produces visible mist that fills a small to medium sized room. You can't adjust the output, but you can adjust the duration or the amount of essential oil you place into the container, so the strength is not a problem and can be adapted to different rooms and personal preferences. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Pros:+Excellent build quality+Compact size+Long lasting lithium battery+Powerful flashlight+Automatic safety features+Nice carrying case+Backup USB charger+Includes both car and wall chargerCons:-Very minor, but I wish it recharged via micro USBAnker is a quality brand in the portable battery market and they don't disappoint with this jump starter. It's a very high quality build from the charger down to the carrying case that's provided. The jump starter itself is solid and rubberized for easy grip and added protection. There's a orange LED power level indicator that lights up when the unit is powered on. There are two USB output ports that will charge any device that takes a charge via USB and goes up to 2.1 Amps. I have portable USB chargers already, but this is nice to have in the car as an emergency item. There is a small charging port used to recharge the jump starter. It was nice that Anker includes both a car charger and wall charger, but I really wish these jump starters could be charged by micro USB themselves. I have plenty of chargers around the house and in all my vehicles that could do the job. In any case, back to the jump starter. The device also has an LED flashlight that is triggered by long pressing the power button. The flashlight can be switched to strobe in SOS as well and is surprisingly bright. I really like the automatic safety features for this jump starter. I'm keeping this one in my mom's car and won't have to worry about installing the cables incorrectly or in the wrong order. The jump starter won't work unless you have everything properly connected. It's small enough to fit in the glove box, but since it comes with such a nice carrying case, we keep it in the trunk. I have another jump starter that works just as well in jumping our vehicles (tested by disconnecting the battery and starting the car with only the jump starter), but the plastic carrying cases that come with other ones breaks so easily. This sturdy nylon case will last beyond the charger itself! I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

2:36 Mins These is a great bluetooth headset that provides a lot of bang for your buck. They are a lot smaller than I expected from the product pictures. Thats a good thing. The sound quality is good, better than I would expect for this price category. What surprised me the most was how well they fit being a semi rigid design. I use headsets while I'm working around the house a lot. Since I'm multitasking, I only like to use one side at a time so I can still hear my family. This headset allows me to do that with ease since the semi rigid frame fits around my head and stays in place. I can easily adjust either side on or off my ear. This inexpensive headset even has controls on board that work well. I've bought my fair share of cheap Bluetooth headsets in the past and have often been disappointed. I'm glad to have found this headset. They fold down very compactly and even come with a small carrying pouch. I received this headset at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

0:55 Mins High quality toys are great, especially when they are as creative as PicassoTiles! My 3 year old daughter already took these and started playing with them even without the PicassoTiles. This item includes 2 PicassoTile cars that roll smoothly and can be linked together. The magic in this set lies in the magnets built into the car truck flat bed. There are strong magnets all around the edge of the that allow you to stick the picasso tiles to and build them up into anything you want. Such a great concept, just so difficult to get your hands on right now since they are out of stock. I made a short video to give you an idea of the quality. I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

1:56 Mins Pros:+Great sound quality+Comfortable and stylish+Good adjustment+Folds into itself for more compact travel+BT or optional 3.5MM wired+Onboard controls and Mic+Touch sensitive controls!+NFC pairing!+Comes with carrying pouch, 3.5MM cable, and MicroUSB cableCons:-Learning curve to use all these features!The SB270 headset offers exceptional features and value for the price category. I was surprised how comfortable they were even after wearing them for a few hours. The padding around the ears is very soft, but offers a good amount of noise isolation that you expect from this style of headphones. There is also soft padding on the frame itself that you can't really see in the product images. Check out my video and you can get a better sense of what I'm talking about. Sound quality is great with this headset for both calls and music. They provide more bass and overall range than any other bluetooth headset I have. I love the fact that I can plug in 3.5mm cables and use these in the standard wired fashion if I need to. Everything folds down very easily and fits into a carrying pouch. Turning the headset on and off is very easy. The same is true for pairing via Bluetooth. This headset even has NFC pairing, which I failed to mention in the video. I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

Pros:+Thin and light+Bright display+MicroSD slot+OTG MicroUSB port (Can charge too!)+Charging port (frees up MicroUSB)+All controls on one side+Front and rear camera+BluetoothCons:-Main charging port is not USB (would prefer 2 USB)-Rear speaker placement blocks sound when laid flatThis is a budget tablet featuring Android 5.1.1. It's not meant to take on any flagship or even mid level tablets on the market. In it's budget category, it's an amazing tablet providing a large 10.1 inch multi touch point display. The resolution of 1024x600 is good for this class. It provides a great ratio for watching widescreen movies. It's powered by a Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7 CPU (4X1.3 GHZ) which is plenty fast for your basic tablet use. Most apps don't utilize multiple cores, but the experience is good with this tablet. For all your standard media consumption apps, it handles them with ease. Gaming is another story and I wouldn't advise this to be use for any 3D intensive games. 16GB storage is fairly standard these days and is plenty for most. However, this tablet features a MicroSD card slot which allows you to expand the storage at your desire! Even better is the OTG MicroUSB port that allows you to connect a variety of devices to this tablet. The MicroUSB port can also charge the device, but it has a dedicated charging port which is good and bad. It's great because it frees up the MicroUSB port, but bad that it uses a proprietary cable to charge. I wish it came with two MicroUSB ports instead! I really like that all the controls are on one side of the tablet. I don't have to feel around the different edges to get to different controls. The cameras on this tablet are great just to have. They aren't going to be as good as what we have on our phones these days, but it works perfectly for skype and other purposes. The bluetooth works well and as expected. All devices pair quickly and easily. One annoyance was the speaker position being on the rear of the device. When you lay the tablet flat, sounds become muted. Make sure you prop this tablet up when listening to anything! I ran some benchmarks for those that are interested. Please see the pictures I provided. I received this device for free in exchange for an honest review.

This is my second pair of hiking poles. These are made of aluminum and my first set was made of carbon fiber. For the same wall thickness, carbon fiber is supposed to be lighter, however, both sets feel like they weigh the same in my hand. In other words, the VOROSY poles feel very light for being aluminum alloy.The poles feel very sturdy. There's a rubber attachment for easier terrain or if you want to add extra shock absorbency. Underneath the rubber attachment is a steel tip that provides extra traction for more challenging terrain. There's also a disc attachment that could be used for softer terrain such has soft dirt, snow, or sand.The built-in spring anti-shock system is a neat feature that will help prevent fatigue during long hikes. The grips feel like your standard foam grips with an adjustable wrist strap. The poles can extend from 25.5" all the way to 53", so it should work for most folks. Overall, I'm pleased with the quality and construction of the VOROSY aluminum poles. I received this poles in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. Please comment if you have any questions.

Pros:+3 coil design = reliable charging+Sturdy portrait mode charging+LED charging indicator+Rubber feet to prevent slippingCons:-LED always onWireless chargers have become main stream now and I have a few to base my review on. I prefer the portrait style wireless chargers because they are the most reliable. When you place your phone on the device, gravity keeps it at the perfect position for charging. I have a few flat chargers and if you don't place them on properly, the charging stops. This design prevents that from happening in most cases. This charger also has 3 charging coils to provide a strong consistent wireless charge with my Galaxy S6. It registers immediately and stays charging the entire time. The LED indicator light stays lit even when the phone isn't charging. This is good and bad. It's good because you can quickly find the charger at night. You pop your phone on and the light changes colors indicating charge. However, I prefer the LED light only to come on when the unit is charging. Personal preference that doesn't impact its use. It comes with a long nicely insulated micro USB cable, but no wall charger. Disclaimer: I received this device for free in exchange for an honest review.

Good case that fits well. The kick stand is the primary reason I wanted this case and it works as you would expect. There's a slight cutout on the bottom edge that lets you grab the kickstand. It supports the massive phone with no issues, but only in landscape mode. It wasn't intended for portrait mode standing, so nothing to complain about there. The two piece design makes the fit very snug and will hopefully protect the phone from drops. The clear case allows you to see the edge plus' back but does add quite a bit of shine to it. Not much you can do about that when you want a clear case though. All the cut outs are appropriately placed allowing easy access to all buttons and features. I'll update when I drop the phone if there's any more damage than I expect. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Works exactly as described. I love how fast it reacts. The varying Ph levels are easy to read and match against the chart. The item comes compactly packaged in a tight fitting plastic container. Each test strip is easy to remove and use. They aren't individually wrapped, so make sure you keep close the container and store it in an appropriate place. Don't place these directly in your mouth either. Spit or place the sample in a container and then apply the test strip to the sample. Seconds later, you'll have your Ph results. There's nothing else to it. I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

This 2 in 1 pacifier clip is a great idea! My twin daughters use pacifiers, so we've always had tether clips to keep them off the ground. We also have a few silicone necklaces and chew toys to keep them entertained. Combine all of that together and you get this item! The colorful silicone pieces immediately grabbed their attention and they loved it! I will have to get another to stop them from fighting over it. The pacifier end is slightly different than what I'm used to. What you have is a snap and a ribbon. When I first removed the clip from the package, I thought it wouldn't fit my pacifiers (Soothies). Then I realized you it would still work. The steps are simple:1 - Unsnap the button2 - Fold the ribbon lengthwise (keep the buttons on top of each other, but unsnapped)3 - Thread the ribbon through any hole4 - Bring the unbuttoned end through the loop (folded ribbon)5 - Snap buttons back togetherThe ribbon seems slightly too short, but it works. The big sunshine can be lifted to clip the entire tether. Overall, it's a great design and high quality piece.Disclaimer: I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

Impressive jewelry box especially if you consider the price point. It's made of faux leather, but it feels nice. The color is accurate. I got the blue color, which resembles Tiffany's blue. I like that it has a zipper that pulls smoothly. It helps ensure my jewelry is secure when I travel. What's most impressive is how much you can fit in this little box! Instead of a box made for one piece of jewelry, this little box has 3 large open divisions for loose jewelry, a pocket with elastic to hold things in, and multiple ring/earring slots. The large open divisions have can be adjusted to suit your needs. The two dividers are simply placed there with pressure. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Pros:+Full  Smart TV functionality+Fast and powerful+Compact+XBMC/KODI preloaded+Full android experience+Dedicated remote+Dedicated power switch+Accepts Micro SD Card+HDMI output (cable included)+4 Host USB ports+Bluetooth 4.0Cons:-Proprietary power adapter (minor but MicroUSB would have been convenient)This MXV smart TV box is a great way to turn any display into a Smart display/TV. I won't go into the endless possibilities a Smart TV box such as this provides. Know that this smart TV box runs Android 4.4, grants you access to the internet and Play store, and already comes loaded with XBMC for a more mature media browsing experience. It has MicroSD card slot and also accepts 4 host USB devices. So in its simplest form, you could throw movies, music, or pictures onto a MicroSD card or USB drive and be ready to go with this device without any internet at all. Since it has a built in media player and the option to use KODI/XBMC, you just select the files and go. The 4 host USB ports allow you to connect USB wireless mice, keyboards, etc. without any fuss. Check the pictures for an example. I connected a wireless mouse to the USB port and my mouse instantly appeared on my TV. I was surprised that all the mouse buttons worked properly. The back and forward shortcut buttons worked as well as the scroll wheel. It even has Bluetooth for more expansion options. If you plan to use this for browsing the web, you'll want to get a wireless keyboard to make the typing experience more pleasant. Just like typical Android, you have an onscreen keyboard, but it's a very slow process using the remote or mouse. I tested playing a variety of video formats including Youtube and they all started playing immediately. The video playback was smooth (as expected for modern media devices) and no audio sync issues. I received this device for free in exchange for an honest review.

The Cyelee 2 way splitter is the perfect solution for mirroring content to two displays. It's so simple and works exactly as expected. It's has its own power adapter that allows it to amplify the signal so it doesn't matter what device is the source. There's really nothing to it. For my case, I just plugged a HDMI cable from my laptop to the HDMI input for this splitter and then connect the HDMI output 1 and 2 to my TV and monitor. Since I control the display type from my Windows 10 laptop, I can choose to have my laptop mirror (essentially having 3 same displays - my laptop, tv, and monitor) or have it run as an extended display and the TV and monitor are mirrored by the splitter. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Excellent fit and finish for the YOPO iWatch stand that really compliments the iWatch. Even the product packaging is very nice and perfect as a gift. This iWatch stand has an aluminum finish that really gives you the feeling it was designed by Apple. The base and back of the stand portion have thick rubber to prevent slipping and sliding. The best part is that the stand piece can be removed to allow routing  the iWatch charging cable through! The end result is a very clean finish that allows you to showcase your iWatch while you charge it! The stand portion is then screwed into the weighted base with two small screws and a hex screw (all included). I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Pros:+Compact+3 AC outlets and 3 USB ports!+1 high powered USB port for 2.1 Amps+Surge protection+On/off switch+Long power cordCons:-Minor gripe, but it would be nice if all 3 USB ports were high powered at 2 Amps each for a total output of 6 Amps.This is a great surge protector that adds USB power outlets to a common layout. You get 3 grounded AC outlets and 3 USB charging ports. This is ideal for travel (in my opinion), but also works well in cleaning up any area by reducing the need for separate USB chargers. I think these are perfect for cruises and travel in countries where electric outlets are scarce. You have a nice long power cord to reach any outlet but grants you access to a lot more outlets where you like. The voltage rating allows this surge protector to work in most countries as long as you have an adapter to fit the outlet. As you can see in the pictures, I tested the USB charging ports using a Portapow V2 USB charging meter to verify its output rating. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

5:43 Mins Pros:+Incredible value+Small projector+Bright (for size and category)+Clear image (for size and category)+Multiple input options (VGA, USB, HDMI, SD Card)+USB input and USB 5V output (2 separate ports!)+Easy to adjust focus and keystone+On-board speaker+On-board controls for basic functions+Remote+LED light source runs cooler and less cool down requiredCons:-Internal cooling fan is loud-6 ft minimum focusing distance-cooler color temperature due to LEDIt's obvious this Fastfox GM60 projector was designed by a company with experience. Careful thought and planning went into this projector. It's amazing how well it performs for the size and price category it fits in. All you need is this projector and an SD card or Chromecast like device and you can have a night of entertainment! The dedicated USB 5 volt output port is perfect for modern sources of media. It powered my Chromecast with ease. The onboard software has the ability to play videos and audio files via the SD card slot, but I didn't test that. I prefer using a more robust media device such as a Chromecast or Android media center device. Please check out the video for all my thoughts on this great little projector.A picture is worth a thousand words then this video should be worth a million. At least I hope it's helpful. I received this device for free in exchange for an honest review.

Simple and effective way to add two USB 3.1 ports to your desktop. Very well made and works as expected. Plugs in easily and works without conflict on my Windows 10 desktop. Just make sure you connect the 4 pin molex power to this card and you'll be good to go. The main advantage here is USB 3.1, which allows increased transfer speeds up to 10 Gbps. This card is backwards compatible with USB3.0 down to USB 1.1 devices. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

This docking station is great for managing drives. It's list of functions aren't lone, it simply allows access to drives and/or cloning them. However, the applications are very useful for average consumers and techies alike. Whether you're replacing computers, expanding storage, or need quick access to drives used for archival, this docking station will serve you well. It doesn't matter if you have a hard drive or an SSD, as long as it's using a SATA connection this docking station will accept it (up to 6TB). You can pull a drive from a system and make quick clones without having to connect to a computer! Just make sure you place the drives in the right slots (A or B) and press the button twice to proceed. The cloning process will begin and show its progress based on the LED percentage. It couldn't be simpler. If you need to make specific changes to certain drives, you can connect the docking station to a computer and have access to both drives. This makes it so easy when you have lots of drives you need to access. It accepts 2.5" or 3.5" drives like other docking stations. There's a power button on the back (as well as the power port and USB 3.0 port) that allows you to easily switch drives. Just power down, swap drives, power up and you're up and running. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Love how technology has progressed. This inexpensive adapter turns my Windows tablet into a portable entertainment device. Not all tablets/devices have mini Displayports, but it's great when they do! The adapter supports high resolution up to 1920x1200. For this adapter, it it converts the mini Displayport to HDMI. I can connect my tablet to any TV and use it in mode (extended desktop, mirrored, LCD off, etc.). Very handy little adapter.  Great quality and easy to use. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

The UNITEK charging station is a great combination device that makes so much sense when you actually use it. It expands on the common charging stations by adding a device stand right on the charger. It props phones and tablets for the ideal viewing angle while allowing you to charge all your devices. For my setup, I charge my tablet, phone, and portable battery pack. Sometimes I need to charge up my bluetooth headset, which still works with the extra USB port on the back. The best thing about this charger is the Qualcomm certified Quick Charge 2.0 USB charging port on the front. This charges my Samsung Galaxy S6 up FAST. It registers as fast charging on my phone and works really well. It's a nice compact setup that is great to keep things organized and charged. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Pros:+High quality finish+built-in safety feature for each AC outlet+2 high speed USB charging ports+2 face plates for optional screwless look+Easy to installCons:-NoneExcellent quality with all the safety features you want if you are replacing an outlet. Not only does it add child tamper resistant AC outlets, but you also get 2 high speed USB charging ports. My home was built right before tamper resistant outlets became standard in this area so I really love this new design where the tamper resistant feature is built in. I don't have to waste money on expensive child safe outlet protectors that can pose a choking hazard or are just so difficult to use. These outlets have a plastic cover inside that retracts when a plug is inserted on both sides. When you remove the plug, the plastic cover inside goes back in place blocking access. It works very well. The two USB outlets make for a very clean device charging outlet as well and these are high speed outlets with a combined 4.0 Amp output! I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

Definitely get a size or two up. I ordered other clothing from Leward and their sizing runs on the smaller side than what I typically buy in the US. Thankfully, the size up works well for me. I typically wear small for undershirts and ordered medium here. It fit very snugly but works well in shaping my body. There is a unique elastic weaving pattern (pictured) sewed around the stomach area that really tightens up against your body. I'm not used to it yet so it wasn't exactly comfortable but it really helps define my figure. The material is very stretchy and held up well after washing. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Make sure you order a size or two up and you'll be happy with these pants. I normally wear medium, but ordered large and they fit on the slightly tighter side. These pants have a double drawstring design making it easy to adjust and keep in place. The material is surprisingly soft and very comfortable against my skin. Nice finish on the pant cuffs (ends?). It keeps the pants in place while not being too tight. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Very comfortable fit and material. Thankfully I ordered a larger size based on other reviewers stating this item runs small. It definitely does. I typically wear medium, but the large fit me with ease. The pockets are HUGE. They weren't kidding when they advertised this item with 2 big pockets. My wife calls these my kangaroo pants. Either way, they are very comfortable and fit well as long as you order a size or two up! I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Pros:+4 USB outlets+1 universal outlet+long power cord+wrap around cord design and travel pouch+Compact designCons:-Charging rates could be improvedThis is a great travel charger. While there are many things I could add to the wishlist of things it doesn't have, I'll focus on what it has and how it performs. There are 4 USB outlets for charging. I believe that is the primary function of this charger and it does that pretty well. I tested the charging outlets with a Portapow V2 usb charging meter and the highest output I recorded was about 1.60 Amps for my Galaxy S5. I have seen up to 1.91 Amps while charging this phone, so this charger has some room for improvement there. However, that doesn't concern me too much based on how I intend to use this charger and how I believe many others will. This is designed primarily for travel and when I travel I only charge my devices at night. I'm not hanging out in the hotel room to use the charger so overall charging speeds is not a big concern here. I charge using portable power banks when I'm out. This charger will allow me to charge 4 devices overnight which is impressive given how compact the device is. I really like the fact that it provides 4 outlets as well as 1 universal AC outlet! The long power cable is perfect for traveling since outlets are rarely positioned in convenient locations when you travel internationally. This allows me to reach the wall outlet anywhere in the room and still position the charger in a convenient area. The wrap around cord design is nice and works well because the power cord is very thin. If you wrap it neatly, it will snap back in place but I broke the clip rather quickly. Thankfully, it comes with a carrying pouch so I wrap it up and toss it in the pouch along with 4 USB cables for charging. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

I love using carabiners as a keychain organizer. This set in particular is inexpensive and the perfect size. They are small yet fully functional. The spring is strong enough to prevent key rings from accidentally coming off. Carabiners are perfect because they are so simple and compact. The no bulk design is ideal for keeping a bunch of keys from getting out of hand. The best part about carabiners is when I need to remove a key, they can be popped out with ease. Great lightweight material here. Enough for the family. I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

Great combination solar charger/portable battery pack. It's a great concept and works pretty well in action.Pros:+Compact+Built-in solar charger+power indicator light+power switch (also battery check)+Can be charged via microUSB as wellCons:-Included cables are junk-Charging rate is averageThe overall size is its greatest asset. It packs away nicely into any backpack pocket for hiking or any activity. It fits easily into any of my pant/short pockets as well (pockets on male clothing). All you need is this charger and a cable to have continuous power when you're away from traditional power sources. It won't allow you to use your devices all day, but it will recharge you part of the way after a day in the sunlight. This is perfect as an emergency charger. As soon as the charger's solar panels receive some light, it will start charging the battery pack. This is indicated by the 4 blue LED's. There is no way to know how fast its recharging from the sun. I tested the charger using a Portapow V2 USB charging meter and confirmed the included cables are junk. Yes, they come with a variety of tips for various devices, but they charge very slow. I wouldn't throw them out just yet. They work, just really slow so maybe just leave it in the car for emergencies. The included cables maxed out at 0.40 Amps. When I switched to my test cables, the charger maxed out at 1.30 Amps. This is rated at a 2 Amp output but doesn't quite reach that mark. I typically see 1.6-1.92 Amps when charging my Galaxy S5 (screen off).  I still think this is a great charger for emergencies, hiking, or just to take advantage of free power around the house if you set it by a window every day. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.Update 11/9/15: Make sure you properly angle this to allow sunlight to directly hit the panels. I had it sitting flat on a window ledge with light coming in at an angle. After two days of moderate sun, it only charged up to 2 bars and barely 2. After I started using the charger it dropped down to 1 bar fast. Readjusted its placement for charging and will update again.

Pros:+Thin and light+Bright display+MicroSD slot+OTG MicroUSB port (Can charge too!)+Charging port (frees up MicroUSB)+All controls on one side+Front and rear camera+BluetoothCons:-Main charging port is not USB (would prefer 2 USB)-Rear speaker placement blocks sound when laid flatThis is a budget tablet featuring Android 5.1.1. It's not meant to take on any flagship or even mid level tablets on the market. In it's budget category, it's an amazing tablet providing a large 10.1 inch multi touch point display. The resolution of 1024x600 is good for this class. It provides a great ratio for watching widescreen movies. It's powered by a Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7 CPU (4X1.3 GHZ) which is plenty fast for your  basic tablet use. Most apps don't utilize multiple cores, but the experience is good with this tablet. For all your standard media consumption apps, it handles them with ease. Gaming is another story and I wouldn't advise this to be use for any 3D intensive games. 16GB storage is fairly standard these days and is plenty for most. However, this tablet features a MicroSD card slot which allows you to expand the storage at your desire! Even better is the OTG MicroUSB port that allows you to connect a variety of devices to this tablet. The MicroUSB port can also charge the device, but it has a dedicated charging port which is good and bad. It's great because it frees up the MicroUSB port, but bad that it uses a proprietary cable to charge. I wish it came with two MicroUSB ports instead! I really like that all the controls are on one side of the tablet. I don't have to feel around the different edges to get to different controls. The cameras on this tablet are great just to have. They aren't going to be as good as what we have on our phones these days, but it works perfectly for skype and other purposes. The bluetooth works well and as expected. All devices pair quickly and easily. One annoyance was the speaker position being on the rear of the device. When you lay the tablet flat, sounds become muted. Make sure you prop this tablet up when listening to anything! I ran some benchmarks for those that are interested. Please see the pictures I provided. I received this device for free in exchange for an honest review.

Very impressive headphones by Sentey. They come packaged in a sturdy zippered shell case that is soft on the inside. The headphones collapse to make them easier to travel with. The headphones are very high quality in finish and the sound quality (most important).Fit and FinishThese headphones really look and feel high quality. There are metal accents all around, but all integrated in such a way to provide great adjustability. You can adjust each side independently of the other and the adjustments are smooth yet stay in place. Each side of the headphones can be rotated for listening by placing the headphones up to your ear instead of wearing them (imagine what a DJ does sometimes). The foam on the headphones is super soft and comfortable. It's very thick and compresses easily. They are very comfortable for extended use and wear. There is also a thick piece of foam padding on top of the headphones for added comfort. The 3.5mm audio cable is a flat tangle free style that can be unplugged from the headphones.Sound QualityThe most important aspect when it comes to headphones. The Sentey headphones are simply great! If you haven't used full sized headphones lately you're in for a treat. Earbud style headphones simply don't compare to full sized headphones such as the Sentey. You hear things you didn't know existed if you were using earbuds. The Sentey headphones produce very even tones across the board while providing good bass without being over the top. It's the bass you want to hear, not the type you simply feel. Audiophiles rejoice, these provide excellent quality and value.I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

I've been through plenty of Pocket Hose ULTRA Telebrands 50FT Expandable Garden Hose AMBER TIP's and they just don't last longer than a season. I'm fairly careful using them to. Out of 4, only one formed a leak in the hose itself. The other 3 I have became damaged at the hose connection ends because they are made of cheap plastic. I tried the Pocket Hose brand original, ultra model, and 2 similarly constructed hoses I picked up locally. DAOTS addresses the issue I experienced by using quality brass connectors at each end! The connectors are where the magic is. They won't warp through extended use or from heat and they also will take a beating compared to cheap plastic. This hose comes with a flow control connector that IS  made of plastic, but can be removed and used without. It also comes with a multifunction hose nozzle that works well, but I don't expect it to last as long as the hose itself because of it's plastic construction. You also get an extra o-ring in case you lose yours or it becomes brittle after a season. I will have to update this review after extended use. It's brand new now and has been working great for the past week! Please check out the close up pictures of the hose material and brass connectors! I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

The title for this sunshade made me expect a larger shade than what arrived, but it is still the best one I've used yet. I can only guess that any larger and it might not work in other vehicles. I'm using this in a 2014 Honda Odyssey. I already have a "jumbo" sunshade made of similar material and design. However, my old one is a two piece design, while the X-Shade is one single piece. They both collapse in similar fashion, but the X-Shade is connected in between the collapsible discs. The X-shade is a better design in my opinion. It provides better coverage and easier placement. The material also appears to have a tighter weave to it, blocking out more light. Take a look at the pictures I took. My old 2 piece shade doesn't fit right in my Odyssey. If I place the old shades vertically, I have to cram it into the windshield area and it bulges leaving gaps. It also dug into the seal and pulled up some foam insulation at the bottom of the windshield one time. Since then, I installed my old shades horizontally and pulled down the sun visor to help keep it in place. Again, it wasn't an ideal fit as you can see in the picture. The X-shade is a much better fit for my vehicle. The extra flaps help block out more light too. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

Wow! Accessory overload for the GoPro! With a single purchase you can have almost every mount you will need or want to use with your GoPro. I love that a branded case is included in this package. You get a Vivitar zippered case that you can shove everything into or neatly organize. Your call, but it's a tough job since you get so many items! The case is a somewhat hard shell exterior  and opens up into a clam style case. Inside you'll find one elastic mesh side to store large items. The other side has a foam material with cutouts that you can replace with an item. The foam is somewhat cheaply made though and doesn't conform well to the case. It seems like it's almost something you throw away if it didn't have the cutouts. Still, its a great way to keep everything contained. You get your standard selfie stick to give you greater recording angles, headstrap, chest strap, wrist strap, floaters, and all the mounting accessories. There is much more but those are the substantial items you'll likely want this kit for. The quality is good and the head and chest straps are very adjustable. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review. Please let me know if you have any questions.

How to make an outlet better? Replace it with a Topgreener USB charging outlet! This outlet receptacle is great. It is high quality and comes with all the important safety certifications so you don't have to worry about it since it's wired up 24/7. Installation is very simple and it even comes with 2 faceplates (one standard and one screwless that snaps on). There are two primary reasons to get this outlet receptacle, the child-safe tamper resistant outlets and the 2 high speed USB charging ports built in. If you don't want a clutter of power strips and chargers overtaking your home, simply replace an existing outlet with this outlet! You will still have access to two AC outlets, but you gain 2 high speed USB charging ports without having to sacrifice an outlet for a charger. The USB outlets were tested with a Portapow V2 usb charging meter and I verified they both charge my devices at the maximum rate allowed. The charging rate didn't fluctuate as I added additional devices to the other port or using the AC outlet. The child safety tamper resistant feature is nice as well. I don't have to worry about finding an outlet protector and replacing it when I'm done using the outlet. There are built-in covers that slide in and out of place when you insert a plug. Great design! I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

This is a large set of RFID blocking sleeves. They are plain and simple in appearance. Very slim and work as intended (tested my badge on a reader). The sleeves are a perfect fit for standard cards and slide in/out easily without obstruction and the passport sleeve fits my US passport with no issues. You get 10 credit card sleeves and 2 passport sleeves, more than enough for my needs. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

These neckties are high quality and have amazing value. They are finely woven, giving a very nice textured pattern. The material is on the thicker side of the ties in my collection, which is a good thing. The thicker material holds up better and resists wrinkling. Knotting the tie is easy to do even with the thicker material. The length and width is just right for classic ties. Love them. I received these ties at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

The Ipow car mount has all the right features in a compact design. It's attractive and doesn't require a lot of space for the suction or mount itself.Pros:+Compact design+Easy one-handed use+Strong 2 step suction+Adjustable (2 pivots)+AttractiveCons:-NoneThe suction is the newer design commonly found on all the great car mounts. It's a sticky gel material that conforms to textured and smooth surfaces. The stickiness alone can hold the mount in place when the car isn't moving. Press the mount down more and the sticky gel pad is suctioned in place. Next you flip the lever down to increase the suction strength to firmly mount it in place. If you're working with a clean surface, this mount will stay in place.There are multiple pivot points to allow adjustment in a variety of angles. The pivot behind the phone has a locking collar to hold it in place once you've found the perfect angle. The mount itself is a spring loaded tension design. Place one side of your phone in and push to extend the mount. The rubber pads and the spring will hold your phone in place without requiring a bottom cradle. Removing your phone is simple as reversing the motion. It fit my Samsung Galaxy S5 and S6 easily. The weight is easily supported and even with a thick Otterbox case on the S5. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

I've tried many wraps for my feet, but they mostly don't relieve the pain from plantar fasciitis. This wrap is specifically designed to help condition your feet to relieve the pain from plantar fasciitis. It works well by providing the right amount of tension without being uncomfortable. I can wear this for long periods of time and help my feet heal. I previously resorted to special shoe inserts that helped, but were uncomfortable. I also rolled my feet over tennis balls, but that was something I could only really do when I was sitting down or standing around the house. With this wrap, I can wear it and go about my day while treating plantar fasciitis! I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review. Please see the pictures for a close up view of the wraps. Sorry, you're not going to get a picture of my feet here!

0:55 Mins This multi-angle stand is pretty handy. It's one of those items you probably won't have a burning need for, but when you use it, you come to love it. There's nothing more annoying to me than propping my phone or tablet up against an object only to have it fall flat on its back. This simple device solves that problem and goes further by offering two ideal viewing angles. You can place your device horizontally or vertically while maintaining its stability. I wish the rubber pads were a little more grippy, but they work well enough during my testing. The device slot is also created to securely hold your device so you can't really fit tablets with bulky cases in here. If you have a case for your tablet, its also likely to have its own stand anyways....This stand also folds up fairly compact so it can be taken on the go or stowed away when not in use. I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. Please let me know if you have any questions.

This is a great Qi wireless charger. It works well with a strong wireless transmission. I tested it using my Samsung Galaxy S6 with case on!Pros:+Compact+Strong wireless transmission (works through my case without issue)+Activity LED (that's not overly bright)+Quality micro USB cable included+Very inexpensive!Cons:-Charger not includedAt the time of this review this charger is only 10 bucks! The last time I bought a $12 wireless charger it went right back to Amazon because it had terrible wireless transmission. I think the market has finally reached a point where we can get such a high performing wireless charger at such a low cost. This wireless charger works just as well as my other single coil wireless charging pads. It works effortlessly and even through my dual layer Spigen case on my S6! There is a small ring of rubber/silicone on top to help keep your device in place from light bumps. I can't test the charger using my USB charging meter, but just looking on my phone it immediately picks up the wireless charge and indicates the expected estimated time to fully charge. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review. Please let me know if you have any questions.

High quality Apple lightning cable that's MFI certified. I got the short 6 in version to help clean up my charging area. I have a number of devices I'll leave charging at the table using a USB charging hub. What I can't stand is the mess of cables required when charging multiple devices. With this 6 inch cord, I don't have to deal with the extra mess. This cable has a very specific use and I think it works perfectly for situations where you will just leave a device to charge. If you want to pick it up and use it while charging, get a longer cable. The Zerolemon lightning cable is well made and works great! It charges all my Apple devices as they should and is quite a bit beefier than the frail original Apple lightning cables that die all too often. I hope this one lasts a long time but I will update if I experience anything out of the ordinary. I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review.

This surge protector is a powerful beast! I think this will become the standard for surge protectors in a few years. If it doesn't, it should be. It's just so useful in today's world where we have so many devices that charge via USB.Pros:+Surge protection+6 AC outlets+8!!!! USB ports (4 fast charging, 4 standard)+Long power cord+On/off switchCons:-Could make better use of space for optimal socket placementI wish the power cord was detachable, but that's a minor complaint. This is not a surge protector I bring around. It will stay in place charging a boatload of devices. I tested the high output USB ports using a Portapow V2 USB meter and confirmed it charged as it should. The 8 USB port model has some wasted space (observation from the exterior only). I wish there were more room between the AC outlets to accommodate power bricks. However, with 6 outlets and 8 dedicated USB ports, I'm more than happy with how many devices I can charge at once!
